3784
3785#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
3786namespace detail
3787{
3788 class SVMTraitNull
3789 {
3790 public:
3791 static cl_svm_mem_flags getSVMMemFlags()
3792 {
3793 return 0;
3794 }
3795 };
3796} // namespace detail
3797
3798template<class Trait = detail::SVMTraitNull>
3799class SVMTraitReadWrite
3800{
3801public:
3802 static cl_svm_mem_flags getSVMMemFlags()
3803 {
3804 return CL_MEM_READ_WRITE |
3805 Trait::getSVMMemFlags();
3806 }
3807};
3808
3809template<class Trait = detail::SVMTraitNull>
3810class SVMTraitReadOnly
3811{
3812public:
3813 static cl_svm_mem_flags getSVMMemFlags()
3814 {
3815 return CL_MEM_READ_ONLY |
3816 Trait::getSVMMemFlags();
3817 }
3818};
3819
3820template<class Trait = detail::SVMTraitNull>
3821class SVMTraitWriteOnly
3822{
3823public:
3824 static cl_svm_mem_flags getSVMMemFlags()
3825 {
3826 return CL_MEM_WRITE_ONLY |
3827 Trait::getSVMMemFlags();
3828 }
3829};
3830
3831template<class Trait = SVMTraitReadWrite<>>
3832class SVMTraitCoarse
3833{
3834public:
3835 static cl_svm_mem_flags getSVMMemFlags()
3836 {
3837 return Trait::getSVMMemFlags();
3838 }
3839};
3840
3841template<class Trait = SVMTraitReadWrite<>>
3842class SVMTraitFine
3843{
3844public:
3845 static cl_svm_mem_flags getSVMMemFlags()
3846 {
3847 return CL_MEM_SVM_FINE_GRAIN_BUFFER |
3848 Trait::getSVMMemFlags();
3849 }
3850};
3851
3852template<class Trait = SVMTraitReadWrite<>>
3853class SVMTraitAtomic
3854{
3855public:
3856 static cl_svm_mem_flags getSVMMemFlags()
3857 {
3858 return
3859 CL_MEM_SVM_FINE_GRAIN_BUFFER |
3860 CL_MEM_SVM_ATOMICS |
3861 Trait::getSVMMemFlags();
3862 }
3863};
3864
3865// Pre-declare SVM map function
3866template<typename T>
3867inline cl_int enqueueMapSVM(
3868 T* ptr,
3869 cl_bool blocking,
3870 cl_map_flags flags,
3871 size_type size,
3872 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
3873 Event* event = nullptr);
3874
3886template<typename T, class SVMTrait>
3887class SVMAllocator {
3888private:
3889 Context context_;
3890
3891public:
3892 typedef T value_type;
3893 typedef value_type* pointer;
3894 typedef const value_type* const_pointer;
3895 typedef value_type& reference;
3896 typedef const value_type& const_reference;
3897 typedef std::size_t size_type;
3898 typedef std::ptrdiff_t difference_type;
3899
3900 template<typename U>
3901 struct rebind
3902 {
3903 typedef SVMAllocator<U, SVMTrait> other;
3904 };
3905
3906 template<typename U, typename V>
3907 friend class SVMAllocator;
3908
3909 SVMAllocator() :
3910 context_(Context::getDefault())
3911 {
3912 }
3913
3914 explicit SVMAllocator(cl::Context context) :
3915 context_(context)
3916 {
3917 }
3918
3919
3920 SVMAllocator(const SVMAllocator &other) :
3921 context_(other.context_)
3922 {
3923 }
3924
3925 template<typename U>
3926 SVMAllocator(const SVMAllocator<U, SVMTrait> &other) :
3927 context_(other.context_)
3928 {
3929 }
3930
3931 ~SVMAllocator()
3932 {
3933 }
3934
3935 pointer address(reference r) noexcept
3936 {
3937 return std::addressof(r);
3938 }
3939
3940 const_pointer address(const_reference r) noexcept
3941 {
3942 return std::addressof(r);
3943 }
3944
3951 pointer allocate(
3952 size_type size,
3953 typename cl::SVMAllocator<void, SVMTrait>::const_pointer = 0)
3954 {
3955 // Allocate memory with default alignment matching the size of the type
3956 void* voidPointer =
3957 clSVMAlloc(
3958 context_(),
3959 SVMTrait::getSVMMemFlags(),
3960 size*sizeof(T),
3961 0);
3962 pointer retValue = reinterpret_cast<pointer>(
3963 voidPointer);
3964#if defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_EXCEPTIONS)
3965 if (!retValue) {
3966 std::bad_alloc excep;
3967 throw excep;
3968 }
3969#endif // #if defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_EXCEPTIONS)
3970
3971 // If allocation was coarse-grained then map it
3972 if (!(SVMTrait::getSVMMemFlags() & CL_MEM_SVM_FINE_GRAIN_BUFFER)) {
3973 cl_int err = enqueueMapSVM(retValue, CL_TRUE, CL_MAP_READ | CL_MAP_WRITE, size*sizeof(T));
3974 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
3975 std::bad_alloc excep;
3976 throw excep;
3977 }
3978 }
3979
3980 // If exceptions disabled, return null pointer from allocator
3981 return retValue;
3982 }
3983
3984 void deallocate(pointer p, size_type)
3985 {
3986 clSVMFree(context_(), p);
3987 }
3988
3993 size_type max_size() const noexcept
3994 {
3995 size_type maxSize = std::numeric_limits<size_type>::max() / sizeof(T);
3996
3997 for (const Device &d : context_.getInfo<CL_CONTEXT_DEVICES>()) {
3998 maxSize = std::min(
3999 maxSize,
4000 static_cast<size_type>(d.getInfo<CL_DEVICE_MAX_MEM_ALLOC_SIZE>()));
4001 }
4002
4003 return maxSize;
4004 }
4005
4006 template< class U, class... Args >
4007 void construct(U* p, Args&&... args)
4008 {
4009 new(p)T(args...);
4010 }
4011
4012 template< class U >
4013 void destroy(U* p)
4014 {
4015 p->~U();
4016 }
4017
4021 inline bool operator==(SVMAllocator const& rhs)
4022 {
4023 return (context_==rhs.context_);
4024 }
4025
4026 inline bool operator!=(SVMAllocator const& a)
4027 {
4028 return !operator==(a);
4029 }
4030}; // class SVMAllocator return cl::pointer<T>(tmp, detail::Deleter<T, Alloc>{alloc, copies});
4031
4032
4033template<class SVMTrait>
4034class SVMAllocator<void, SVMTrait> {
4035public:
4036 typedef void value_type;
4037 typedef value_type* pointer;
4038 typedef const value_type* const_pointer;
4039
4040 template<typename U>
4041 struct rebind
4042 {
4043 typedef SVMAllocator<U, SVMTrait> other;
4044 };
4045
4046 template<typename U, typename V>
4047 friend class SVMAllocator;
4048};
4049
4050#if !defined(CL_HPP_NO_STD_UNIQUE_PTR)
4051namespace detail
4052{
4053 template<class Alloc>
4054 class Deleter {
4055 private:
4056 Alloc alloc_;
4057 size_type copies_;
4058
4059 public:
4060 typedef typename std::allocator_traits<Alloc>::pointer pointer;
4061
4062 Deleter(const Alloc &alloc, size_type copies) : alloc_{ alloc }, copies_{ copies }
4063 {
4064 }
4065
4066 void operator()(pointer ptr) const {
4067 Alloc tmpAlloc{ alloc_ };
4068 std::allocator_traits<Alloc>::destroy(tmpAlloc, std::addressof(*ptr));
4069 std::allocator_traits<Alloc>::deallocate(tmpAlloc, ptr, copies_);
4070 }
4071 };
4072} // namespace detail
4073
4080template <class T, class Alloc, class... Args>
4081cl::pointer<T, detail::Deleter<Alloc>> allocate_pointer(const Alloc &alloc_, Args&&... args)
4082{
4083 Alloc alloc(alloc_);
4084 static const size_type copies = 1;
4085
4086 // Ensure that creation of the management block and the
4087 // object are dealt with separately such that we only provide a deleter
4088
4089 T* tmp = std::allocator_traits<Alloc>::allocate(alloc, copies);
4090 if (!tmp) {
4091 std::bad_alloc excep;
4092 throw excep;
4093 }
4094 try {
4095 std::allocator_traits<Alloc>::construct(
4096 alloc,
4097 std::addressof(*tmp),
4098 std::forward<Args>(args)...);
4099
4100 return cl::pointer<T, detail::Deleter<Alloc>>(tmp, detail::Deleter<Alloc>{alloc, copies});
4101 }
4102 catch (std::bad_alloc&)
4103 {
4104 std::allocator_traits<Alloc>::deallocate(alloc, tmp, copies);
4105 throw;
4106 }
4107}
4108
4109template< class T, class SVMTrait, class... Args >
4110cl::pointer<T, detail::Deleter<SVMAllocator<T, SVMTrait>>> allocate_svm(Args... args)
4111{
4112 SVMAllocator<T, SVMTrait> alloc;
4113 return cl::allocate_pointer<T>(alloc, args...);
4114}
4115
4116template< class T, class SVMTrait, class... Args >
4117cl::pointer<T, detail::Deleter<SVMAllocator<T, SVMTrait>>> allocate_svm(const cl::Context &c, Args... args)
4118{
4119 SVMAllocator<T, SVMTrait> alloc(c);
4120 return cl::allocate_pointer<T>(alloc, args...);
4121}
4122#endif // #if !defined(CL_HPP_NO_STD_UNIQUE_PTR)
4123
4127template < class T >
4128using coarse_svm_vector = vector<T, cl::SVMAllocator<int, cl::SVMTraitCoarse<>>>;
4129
4133template < class T >
4134using fine_svm_vector = vector<T, cl::SVMAllocator<int, cl::SVMTraitFine<>>>;
4135
4139template < class T >
4140using atomic_svm_vector = vector<T, cl::SVMAllocator<int, cl::SVMTraitAtomic<>>>;
4141
4142#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
4143
4144
4151class Buffer : public Memory
4152{
4153public:
4154
4162 Buffer(
4163 const Context& context,
4164 cl_mem_flags flags,
4165 size_type size,
4166 void* host_ptr = nullptr,
4167 cl_int* err = nullptr)
4168 {
4169 cl_int error;
4170 object_ = ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size, host_ptr, &error);
4171
4172 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
4173 if (err != nullptr) {
4174 *err = error;
4175 }
4176 }
4177
4178#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 300
4189 Buffer(
4190 const Context& context,
4191 const vector<cl_mem_properties>& properties,
4192 cl_mem_flags flags,
4193 size_type size,
4194 void* host_ptr = nullptr,
4195 cl_int* err = nullptr)
4196 {
4197 cl_int error;
4198
4199 if (properties.empty()) {
4200 object_ = ::clCreateBufferWithProperties(context(), nullptr, flags,
4201 size, host_ptr, &error);
4202 }
4203 else {
4204 object_ = ::clCreateBufferWithProperties(
4205 context(), properties.data(), flags, size, host_ptr, &error);
4206 }
4207
4208 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
4209 if (err != nullptr) {
4210 *err = error;
4211 }
4212 }
4213#endif
4214
4224 Buffer(
4225 cl_mem_flags flags,
4226 size_type size,
4227 void* host_ptr = nullptr,
4228 cl_int* err = nullptr) : Buffer(Context::getDefault(err), flags, size, host_ptr, err) { }
4229
4230#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 300
4243 Buffer(
4244 const vector<cl_mem_properties>& properties,
4245 cl_mem_flags flags,
4246 size_type size,
4247 void* host_ptr = nullptr,
4248 cl_int* err = nullptr) : Buffer(Context::getDefault(err), properties, flags, size, host_ptr, err) { }
4249#endif
4250
4256 template< typename IteratorType >
4257 Buffer(
4258 IteratorType startIterator,
4259 IteratorType endIterator,
4260 bool readOnly,
4261 bool useHostPtr = false,
4262 cl_int* err = nullptr)
4263 {
4264 typedef typename std::iterator_traits<IteratorType>::value_type DataType;
4265 cl_int error;
4266
4267 cl_mem_flags flags = 0;
4268 if( readOnly ) {
4269 flags |= CL_MEM_READ_ONLY;
4270 }
4271 else {
4272 flags |= CL_MEM_READ_WRITE;
4273 }
4274 if( useHostPtr ) {
4275 flags |= CL_MEM_USE_HOST_PTR;
4276 }
4277
4278 size_type size = sizeof(DataType)*(endIterator - startIterator);
4279
4280 Context context = Context::getDefault(err);
4281
4282 if( useHostPtr ) {
4283 object_ = ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size, const_cast<DataType*>(&*startIterator), &error);
4284 } else {
4285 object_ = ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size, 0, &error);
4286 }
4287
4288 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
4289 if (err != nullptr) {
4290 *err = error;
4291 }
4292
4293 if( !useHostPtr ) {
4294 error = cl::copy(startIterator, endIterator, *this);
4295 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
4296 if (err != nullptr) {
4297 *err = error;
4298 }
4299 }
4300 }
4301
4307 template< typename IteratorType >
4308 Buffer(const Context &context, IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator,
4309 bool readOnly, bool useHostPtr = false, cl_int* err = nullptr);
4310
4315 template< typename IteratorType >
4316 Buffer(const CommandQueue &queue, IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator,
4317 bool readOnly, bool useHostPtr = false, cl_int* err = nullptr);
4318
4320 Buffer() : Memory() { }
4321
4329 explicit Buffer(const cl_mem& buffer, bool retainObject = false) :
4330 Memory(buffer, retainObject) { }
4331
4336 Buffer& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
4337 {
4338 Memory::operator=(rhs);
4339 return *this;
4340 }
4341
4342
4343#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 110
4348 Buffer createSubBuffer(
4349 cl_mem_flags flags,
4350 cl_buffer_create_type buffer_create_type,
4351 const void * buffer_create_info,
4352 cl_int * err = nullptr)
4353 {
4354 Buffer result;
4355 cl_int error;
4356 result.object_ = ::clCreateSubBuffer(
4357 object_,
4358 flags,
4359 buffer_create_type,
4360 buffer_create_info,
4361 &error);
4362
4363 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_SUBBUFFER_ERR);
4364 if (err != nullptr) {
4365 *err = error;
4366 }
4367
4368 return result;
4369 }
4370#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 110
4371};
4372
4373#if defined (CL_HPP_USE_DX_INTEROP)
4382class BufferD3D10 : public Buffer
4383{
4384public:
4385
4386
4392 BufferD3D10(
4393 const Context& context,
4394 cl_mem_flags flags,
4395 ID3D10Buffer* bufobj,
4396 cl_int * err = nullptr) : pfn_clCreateFromD3D10BufferKHR(nullptr)
4397 {
4398 typedef CL_API_ENTRY cl_mem (CL_API_CALL *PFN_clCreateFromD3D10BufferKHR)(
4399 cl_context context, cl_mem_flags flags, ID3D10Buffer* buffer,
4400 cl_int* errcode_ret);
4401 PFN_clCreateFromD3D10BufferKHR pfn_clCreateFromD3D10BufferKHR;
4402#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
4403 vector<cl_context_properties> props = context.getInfo<CL_CONTEXT_PROPERTIES>();
4404 cl_platform platform = nullptr;
4405 for( int i = 0; i < props.size(); ++i ) {
4406 if( props[i] == CL_CONTEXT_PLATFORM ) {
4407 platform = props[i+1];
4408 }
4409 }
4410 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clCreateFromD3D10BufferKHR);
4411#endif
4412#if CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 120
4413 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clCreateFromD3D10BufferKHR);
4414#endif
4415
4416 cl_int error;
4417 object_ = pfn_clCreateFromD3D10BufferKHR(
4418 context(),
4419 flags,
4420 bufobj,
4421 &error);
4422
4423 // TODO: This should really have a D3D10 rerror code!
4424 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_GL_BUFFER_ERR);
4425 if (err != nullptr) {
4426 *err = error;
4427 }
4428 }
4429
4431 BufferD3D10() : Buffer() { }
4432
4440 explicit BufferD3D10(const cl_mem& buffer, bool retainObject = false) :
4441 Buffer(buffer, retainObject) { }
4442
4447 BufferD3D10& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
4448 {
4449 Buffer::operator=(rhs);
4450 return *this;
4451 }
4452};
4453#endif
4454
4463class BufferGL : public Buffer
4464{
4465public:
4471 BufferGL(
4472 const Context& context,

4476 {

4479 context(),
4480 flags,
4481 bufobj,
4482 &error);
4483

4485 if (err != nullptr) {
4486 *err = error;
4487 }
4488 }

4491 BufferGL() : Buffer() { }
4492
4500 explicit BufferGL(const cl_mem& buffer, bool retainObject = false) :
4501 Buffer(buffer, retainObject) { }
4502
4507 BufferGL& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
4508 {

4510 return *this;
4511 }
4512
4513
4515 cl_int getObjectInfo(
4516 cl_gl_object_type *type,
4517 cl_GLuint * gl_object_name)
4518 {
4519 return detail::errHandler(
4520 ::clGetGLObjectInfo(object_,type,gl_object_name),
4521 __GET_GL_OBJECT_INFO_ERR);
4522 }
4523};

4594
4601class Image : public Memory
4602{
4603protected:
4605 Image() : Memory() { }
4606
4614 explicit Image(const cl_mem& image, bool retainObject = false) :
4615 Memory(image, retainObject) { }
4616
4621 Image& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
4622 {
4623 Memory::operator=(rhs);
4624 return *this;
4625 }
4626
4627
4628public:
4630 template <typename T>
4631 cl_int getImageInfo(cl_image_info name, T* param) const
4632 {
4633 return detail::errHandler(
4634 detail::getInfo(&::clGetImageInfo, object_, name, param),
4635 __GET_IMAGE_INFO_ERR);
4636 }
4637
4639 template <cl_image_info name> typename
4640 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_image_info, name>::param_type
4641 getImageInfo(cl_int* err = nullptr) const
4642 {
4643 typename detail::param_traits<
4644 detail::cl_image_info, name>::param_type param;
4645 cl_int result = getImageInfo(name, &param);
4646 if (err != nullptr) {
4647 *err = result;
4648 }
4649 return param;
4650 }
4651};
4652
4653#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
4660class Image1D : public Image
4661{
4662public:
4667 Image1D(
4668 const Context& context,
4669 cl_mem_flags flags,
4670 ImageFormat format,
4671 size_type width,
4672 void* host_ptr = nullptr,
4673 cl_int* err = nullptr)
4674 {
4675 cl_int error;
4676
4677 cl_image_desc desc = {};
4678 desc.image_type = CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE1D;
4679 desc.image_width = width;
4680
4681 object_ = ::clCreateImage(
4682 context(),
4683 flags,
4684 &format,
4685 &desc,
4686 host_ptr,
4687 &error);
4688
4689 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
4690 if (err != nullptr) {
4691 *err = error;
4692 }
4693 }
4694
4696 Image1D() { }
4697
4705 explicit Image1D(const cl_mem& image1D, bool retainObject = false) :
4706 Image(image1D, retainObject) { }
4707
4712 Image1D& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
4713 {
4714 Image::operator=(rhs);
4715 return *this;
4716 }
4717
4718
4719};

4724class Image1DBuffer : public Image
4725{
4726public:
4727 Image1DBuffer(
4728 const Context& context,
4729 cl_mem_flags flags,
4730 ImageFormat format,
4731 size_type width,
4732 const Buffer &buffer,
4733 cl_int* err = nullptr)
4734 {
4735 cl_int error;
4736
4737 cl_image_desc desc = {};
4738 desc.image_type = CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE1D_BUFFER;
4739 desc.image_width = width;
4740 desc.buffer = buffer();
4741
4742 object_ = ::clCreateImage(
4743 context(),
4744 flags,
4745 &format,
4746 &desc,
4747 nullptr,
4748 &error);
4749
4750 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
4751 if (err != nullptr) {
4752 *err = error;
4753 }
4754 }

4781class Image1DArray : public Image
4782{
4783public:
4784 Image1DArray(
4785 const Context& context,
4786 cl_mem_flags flags,
4787 ImageFormat format,
4788 size_type arraySize,
4789 size_type width,
4790 size_type rowPitch,
4791 void* host_ptr = nullptr,
4792 cl_int* err = nullptr)
4793 {
4794 cl_int error;
4795
4796 cl_image_desc desc = {};
4797 desc.image_type = CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE1D_ARRAY;
4798 desc.image_width = width;
4799 desc.image_array_size = arraySize;
4800 desc.image_row_pitch = rowPitch;
4801
4802 object_ = ::clCreateImage(
4803 context(),
4804 flags,
4805 &format,
4806 &desc,
4807 host_ptr,
4808 &error);
4809

4812 *err = error;
4813 }
4814 }

4838
4839
4846class Image2D : public Image
4847{
4848public:
4853 Image2D(
4854 const Context& context,
4855 cl_mem_flags flags,
4856 ImageFormat format,
4857 size_type width,
4858 size_type height,
4859 size_type row_pitch = 0,
4860 void* host_ptr = nullptr,
4861 cl_int* err = nullptr)
4862 {
4863 cl_int error;
4864 bool useCreateImage;
4865
4866#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120 && CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 120
4867 // Run-time decision based on the actual platform
4868 {
4869 cl_uint version = detail::getContextPlatformVersion(context());
4870 useCreateImage = (version >= 0x10002); // OpenCL 1.2 or above
4871 }
4872#elif CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
4873 useCreateImage = true;
4874#else
4875 useCreateImage = false;
4876#endif
4877
4878#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
4879 if (useCreateImage)
4880 {
4881 cl_image_desc desc = {};
4882 desc.image_type = CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE2D;
4883 desc.image_width = width;
4884 desc.image_height = height;
4885 desc.image_row_pitch = row_pitch;
4886
4887 object_ = ::clCreateImage(
4888 context(),
4889 flags,
4890 &format,
4891 &desc,
4892 host_ptr,
4893 &error);
4894
4895 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
4896 if (err != nullptr) {
4897 *err = error;
4898 }
4899 }
4900#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
4901#if CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 120
4902 if (!useCreateImage)
4903 {
4904 object_ = ::clCreateImage2D(
4905 context(), flags,&format, width, height, row_pitch, host_ptr, &error);
4906
4907 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE2D_ERR);
4908 if (err != nullptr) {
4909 *err = error;
4910 }
4911 }
4912#endif // CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 120
4913 }
4914
4915#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
4924 Image2D(
4925 const Context& context,
4926 ImageFormat format,
4927 const Buffer &sourceBuffer,
4928 size_type width,
4929 size_type height,
4930 size_type row_pitch = 0,
4931 cl_int* err = nullptr)
4932 {
4933 cl_int error;
4934
4935 cl_image_desc desc = {};
4936 desc.image_type = CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE2D;
4937 desc.image_width = width;
4938 desc.image_height = height;
4939 desc.image_row_pitch = row_pitch;
4940 desc.buffer = sourceBuffer();
4941
4942 object_ = ::clCreateImage(
4943 context(),
4944 0, // flags inherited from buffer
4945 &format,
4946 &desc,
4947 nullptr,
4948 &error);
4949
4950 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
4951 if (err != nullptr) {
4952 *err = error;
4953 }
4954 }
4955#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
4956
4957#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
4970 Image2D(
4971 const Context& context,
4972 cl_channel_order order,
4973 const Image &sourceImage,
4974 cl_int* err = nullptr)
4975 {
4976 cl_int error;
4977
4978 // Descriptor fields have to match source image
4979 size_type sourceWidth =
4980 sourceImage.getImageInfo<CL_IMAGE_WIDTH>();
4981 size_type sourceHeight =
4982 sourceImage.getImageInfo<CL_IMAGE_HEIGHT>();
4983 size_type sourceRowPitch =
4984 sourceImage.getImageInfo<CL_IMAGE_ROW_PITCH>();
4985 cl_uint sourceNumMIPLevels =
4986 sourceImage.getImageInfo<CL_IMAGE_NUM_MIP_LEVELS>();
4987 cl_uint sourceNumSamples =
4988 sourceImage.getImageInfo<CL_IMAGE_NUM_SAMPLES>();
4989 cl_image_format sourceFormat =
4990 sourceImage.getImageInfo<CL_IMAGE_FORMAT>();
4991
4992 // Update only the channel order.
4993 // Channel format inherited from source.
4994 sourceFormat.image_channel_order = order;
4995
4996 cl_image_desc desc = {};
4997 desc.image_type = CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE2D;
4998 desc.image_width = sourceWidth;
4999 desc.image_height = sourceHeight;
5000 desc.image_row_pitch = sourceRowPitch;
5001 desc.num_mip_levels = sourceNumMIPLevels;
5002 desc.num_samples = sourceNumSamples;
5003 desc.buffer = sourceImage();
5004
5005 object_ = ::clCreateImage(
5006 context(),
5007 0, // flags should be inherited from mem_object
5008 &sourceFormat,
5009 &desc,
5010 nullptr,
5011 &error);
5012
5013 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
5014 if (err != nullptr) {
5015 *err = error;
5016 }
5017 }
5018#endif //#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
5019
5021 Image2D() { }
5022
5030 explicit Image2D(const cl_mem& image2D, bool retainObject = false) :
5031 Image(image2D, retainObject) { }
5032
5037 Image2D& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
5038 {
5039 Image::operator=(rhs);
5040 return *this;
5041 }
5042
5043
5044
5045
5046};
5047
5048
5049#if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
5059class CL_API_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED Image2DGL : public Image2D
5060{
5061public:
5067 Image2DGL(
5068 const Context& context,
5069 cl_mem_flags flags,
5070 cl_GLenum target,
5071 cl_GLint miplevel,
5072 cl_GLuint texobj,
5073 cl_int * err = nullptr)
5074 {
5075 cl_int error;
5076 object_ = ::clCreateFromGLTexture2D(
5077 context(),
5078 flags,
5079 target,
5080 miplevel,
5081 texobj,
5082 &error);
5083
5084 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_GL_TEXTURE_2D_ERR);
5085 if (err != nullptr) {
5086 *err = error;
5087 }
5088
5089 }
5090
5092 Image2DGL() : Image2D() { }
5093
5101 explicit Image2DGL(const cl_mem& image, bool retainObject = false) :
5102 Image2D(image, retainObject) { }
5103
5108 Image2DGL& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
5109 {
5110 Image2D::operator=(rhs);
5111 return *this;
5112 }
5113
5114
5115
5116} CL_API_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED;
5117#endif // CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS
5118
5119#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
5123class Image2DArray : public Image
5124{
5125public:
5126 Image2DArray(
5127 const Context& context,
5128 cl_mem_flags flags,
5129 ImageFormat format,
5130 size_type arraySize,
5131 size_type width,
5132 size_type height,
5133 size_type rowPitch,
5134 size_type slicePitch,
5135 void* host_ptr = nullptr,
5136 cl_int* err = nullptr)
5137 {
5138 cl_int error;
5139
5140 cl_image_desc desc = {};
5141 desc.image_type = CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE2D_ARRAY;
5142 desc.image_width = width;
5143 desc.image_height = height;
5144 desc.image_array_size = arraySize;
5145 desc.image_row_pitch = rowPitch;
5146 desc.image_slice_pitch = slicePitch;
5147
5148 object_ = ::clCreateImage(
5149 context(),
5150 flags,
5151 &format,
5152 &desc,
5153 host_ptr,
5154 &error);
5155
5156 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
5157 if (err != nullptr) {
5158 *err = error;
5159 }
5160 }
5161
5162 Image2DArray() { }
5163
5171 explicit Image2DArray(const cl_mem& imageArray, bool retainObject = false) : Image(imageArray, retainObject) { }
5172

5174 {

5176 return *this;
5177 }
5178
5179};
5180#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
5181
5188class Image3D : public Image
5189{
5190public:
5195 Image3D(
5196 const Context& context,
5197 cl_mem_flags flags,
5198 ImageFormat format,
5199 size_type width,
5200 size_type height,
5201 size_type depth,
5202 size_type row_pitch = 0,
5203 size_type slice_pitch = 0,
5204 void* host_ptr = nullptr,
5205 cl_int* err = nullptr)
5206 {
5207 cl_int error;
5208 bool useCreateImage;
5209
5210#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120 && CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 120
5211 // Run-time decision based on the actual platform
5212 {
5213 cl_uint version = detail::getContextPlatformVersion(context());
5214 useCreateImage = (version >= 0x10002); // OpenCL 1.2 or above
5215 }
5216#elif CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
5217 useCreateImage = true;
5218#else
5219 useCreateImage = false;
5220#endif
5221
5222#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
5223 if (useCreateImage)
5224 {
5225 cl_image_desc desc = {};
5226 desc.image_type = CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE3D;
5227 desc.image_width = width;
5228 desc.image_height = height;
5229 desc.image_depth = depth;
5230 desc.image_row_pitch = row_pitch;
5231 desc.image_slice_pitch = slice_pitch;
5232
5233 object_ = ::clCreateImage(
5234 context(),
5235 flags,
5236 &format,
5237 &desc,
5238 host_ptr,
5239 &error);
5240
5241 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
5242 if (err != nullptr) {
5243 *err = error;
5244 }
5245 }
5246#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
5247#if CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 120
5248 if (!useCreateImage)
5249 {
5250 object_ = ::clCreateImage3D(
5251 context(), flags, &format, width, height, depth, row_pitch,
5252 slice_pitch, host_ptr, &error);
5253
5254 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE3D_ERR);
5255 if (err != nullptr) {
5256 *err = error;
5257 }
5258 }
5259#endif // CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 120
5260 }
5261
5263 Image3D() : Image() { }
5264
5272 explicit Image3D(const cl_mem& image3D, bool retainObject = false) :
5273 Image(image3D, retainObject) { }
5274
5279 Image3D& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
5280 {
5281 Image::operator=(rhs);
5282 return *this;
5283 }
5284
5285};
5286
5287#if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
5296class Image3DGL : public Image3D
5297{
5298public:
5304 Image3DGL(
5305 const Context& context,
5306 cl_mem_flags flags,
5307 cl_GLenum target,
5308 cl_GLint miplevel,
5309 cl_GLuint texobj,
5310 cl_int * err = nullptr)
5311 {
5312 cl_int error;
5313 object_ = ::clCreateFromGLTexture3D(
5314 context(),
5315 flags,
5316 target,
5317 miplevel,
5318 texobj,
5319 &error);
5320
5321 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_GL_TEXTURE_3D_ERR);
5322 if (err != nullptr) {
5323 *err = error;
5324 }
5325 }
5326
5328 Image3DGL() : Image3D() { }
5329
5337 explicit Image3DGL(const cl_mem& image, bool retainObject = false) :
5338 Image3D(image, retainObject) { }
5339
5344 Image3DGL& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
5345 {
5346 Image3D::operator=(rhs);
5347 return *this;
5348 }
5349
5350};
5351#endif // CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS
5352
5353#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120

5361{
5362public:
5363 ImageGL(
5364 const Context& context,
5365 cl_mem_flags flags,
5366 cl_GLenum target,
5367 cl_GLint miplevel,
5368 cl_GLuint texobj,
5369 cl_int * err = nullptr)
5370 {

5373 context(),
5374 flags,
5375 target,
5376 miplevel,
5377 texobj,
5378 &error);
5379
5380 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_GL_TEXTURE_ERR);
5381 if (err != nullptr) {
5382 *err = error;
5383 }
5384 }

5387
