5408
5409#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
5416class Pipe : public Memory
5417{
5418public:
5419
5429 Pipe(
5430 const Context& context,
5431 cl_uint packet_size,
5432 cl_uint max_packets,
5433 cl_int* err = nullptr)
5434 {
5435 cl_int error;
5436
5437 cl_mem_flags flags = CL_MEM_READ_WRITE | CL_MEM_HOST_NO_ACCESS;
5438 object_ = ::clCreatePipe(context(), flags, packet_size, max_packets, nullptr, &error);
5439
5440 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PIPE_ERR);
5441 if (err != nullptr) {
5442 *err = error;
5443 }
5444 }
5445
5454 Pipe(
5455 cl_uint packet_size,
5456 cl_uint max_packets,
5457 cl_int* err = nullptr)
5458 {
5459 cl_int error;
5460
5461 Context context = Context::getDefault(err);
5462
5463 cl_mem_flags flags = CL_MEM_READ_WRITE | CL_MEM_HOST_NO_ACCESS;
5464 object_ = ::clCreatePipe(context(), flags, packet_size, max_packets, nullptr, &error);
5465
5466 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PIPE_ERR);
5467 if (err != nullptr) {
5468 *err = error;
5469 }
5470 }
5471
5473 Pipe() : Memory() { }
5474
5482 explicit Pipe(const cl_mem& pipe, bool retainObject = false) :
5483 Memory(pipe, retainObject) { }
5484
5489 Pipe& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
5490 {
5491 Memory::operator=(rhs);
5492 return *this;
5493 }
5494
5495
5496
5498 template <typename T>
5499 cl_int getInfo(cl_pipe_info name, T* param) const
5500 {
5501 return detail::errHandler(
5502 detail::getInfo(&::clGetPipeInfo, object_, name, param),
5503 __GET_PIPE_INFO_ERR);
5504 }
5505
5507 template <cl_pipe_info name> typename
5508 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_pipe_info, name>::param_type
5509 getInfo(cl_int* err = nullptr) const
5510 {
5511 typename detail::param_traits<
5512 detail::cl_pipe_info, name>::param_type param;
5513 cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
5514 if (err != nullptr) {
5515 *err = result;
5516 }
5517 return param;
5518 }
5519}; // class Pipe
5520#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
5521
5522
5531class Sampler : public detail::Wrapper<cl_sampler>
5532{
5533public:
5535 Sampler() { }
5536
5541 Sampler(
5542 const Context& context,
5543 cl_bool normalized_coords,
5544 cl_addressing_mode addressing_mode,
5545 cl_filter_mode filter_mode,
5546 cl_int* err = nullptr)
5547 {
5548 cl_int error;
5549
5550#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
5551 cl_sampler_properties sampler_properties[] = {
5552 CL_SAMPLER_NORMALIZED_COORDS, normalized_coords,
5553 CL_SAMPLER_ADDRESSING_MODE, addressing_mode,
5554 CL_SAMPLER_FILTER_MODE, filter_mode,
5555 0 };
5556 object_ = ::clCreateSamplerWithProperties(
5557 context(),
5558 sampler_properties,
5559 &error);
5560
5561 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_SAMPLER_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
5562 if (err != nullptr) {
5563 *err = error;
5564 }
5565#else
5566 object_ = ::clCreateSampler(
5567 context(),
5568 normalized_coords,
5569 addressing_mode,
5570 filter_mode,
5571 &error);
5572
5573 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_SAMPLER_ERR);
5574 if (err != nullptr) {
5575 *err = error;
5576 }
5577#endif
5578 }
5579
5588 explicit Sampler(const cl_sampler& sampler, bool retainObject = false) :
5589 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(sampler, retainObject) { }
5590
5596 Sampler& operator = (const cl_sampler& rhs)
5597 {
5598 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
5599 return *this;
5600 }
5601
5602
5603
5605 template <typename T>
5606 cl_int getInfo(cl_sampler_info name, T* param) const
5607 {
5608 return detail::errHandler(
5609 detail::getInfo(&::clGetSamplerInfo, object_, name, param),
5610 __GET_SAMPLER_INFO_ERR);
5611 }
5612
5614 template <cl_sampler_info name> typename
5615 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_sampler_info, name>::param_type
5616 getInfo(cl_int* err = nullptr) const
5617 {
5618 typename detail::param_traits<
5619 detail::cl_sampler_info, name>::param_type param;
5620 cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
5621 if (err != nullptr) {
5622 *err = result;
5623 }
5624 return param;
5625 }
5626};
5627
5628class Program;
5629class CommandQueue;
5630class DeviceCommandQueue;
5631class Kernel;
5632
5634class NDRange
5635{
5636private:
5637 size_type sizes_[3];
5638 cl_uint dimensions_;
5639
5640public:
5642 NDRange()
5643 : dimensions_(0)
5644 {
5645 sizes_[0] = 0;
5646 sizes_[1] = 0;
5647 sizes_[2] = 0;
5648 }
5649
5651 NDRange(size_type size0)
5652 : dimensions_(1)
5653 {
5654 sizes_[0] = size0;
5655 sizes_[1] = 1;
5656 sizes_[2] = 1;
5657 }
5658
5660 NDRange(size_type size0, size_type size1)
5661 : dimensions_(2)
5662 {
5663 sizes_[0] = size0;
5664 sizes_[1] = size1;
5665 sizes_[2] = 1;
5666 }
5667
5669 NDRange(size_type size0, size_type size1, size_type size2)
5670 : dimensions_(3)
5671 {
5672 sizes_[0] = size0;
5673 sizes_[1] = size1;
5674 sizes_[2] = size2;
5675 }
5676
5678 NDRange(array<size_type, 1> a) : NDRange(a[0]){}
5679
5681 NDRange(array<size_type, 2> a) : NDRange(a[0], a[1]){}
5682
5684 NDRange(array<size_type, 3> a) : NDRange(a[0], a[1], a[2]){}
5685
5690 operator const size_type*() const {
5691 return sizes_;
5692 }
5693
5695 size_type dimensions() const
5696 {
5697 return dimensions_;
5698 }
5699
5701 // runtime number of dimensions
5702 size_type size() const
5703 {
5704 return dimensions_*sizeof(size_type);
5705 }
5706
5707 size_type* get()
5708 {
5709 return sizes_;
5710 }
5711
5712 const size_type* get() const
5713 {
5714 return sizes_;
5715 }
5716};
5717
5719static const NDRange NullRange;
5720
5722struct LocalSpaceArg
5723{
5724 size_type size_;
5725};
5726
5727namespace detail {
5728
5729template <typename T, class Enable = void>
5730struct KernelArgumentHandler;
5731
5732// Enable for objects that are not subclasses of memory
5733// Pointers, constants etc
5734template <typename T>
5735struct KernelArgumentHandler<T, typename std::enable_if<!std::is_base_of<cl::Memory, T>::value>::type>
5736{
5737 static size_type size(const T&) { return sizeof(T); }
5738 static const T* ptr(const T& value) { return &value; }
5739};
5740
5741// Enable for subclasses of memory where we want to get a reference to the cl_mem out
5742// and pass that in for safety
5743template <typename T>
5744struct KernelArgumentHandler<T, typename std::enable_if<std::is_base_of<cl::Memory, T>::value>::type>
5745{
5746 static size_type size(const T&) { return sizeof(cl_mem); }
5747 static const cl_mem* ptr(const T& value) { return &(value()); }
5748};
5749
5750// Specialization for DeviceCommandQueue defined later
5751
5752template <>
5753struct KernelArgumentHandler<LocalSpaceArg, void>
5754{
5755 static size_type size(const LocalSpaceArg& value) { return value.size_; }
5756 static const void* ptr(const LocalSpaceArg&) { return nullptr; }
5757};
5758
5759}
5761
5765inline LocalSpaceArg
5766Local(size_type size)
5767{
5768 LocalSpaceArg ret = { size };
5769 return ret;
5770}
5771
5780class Kernel : public detail::Wrapper<cl_kernel>
5781{
5782public:
5783 inline Kernel(const Program& program, const char* name, cl_int* err = nullptr);
5784
5786 Kernel() { }
5787
5796 explicit Kernel(const cl_kernel& kernel, bool retainObject = false) :
5797 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(kernel, retainObject) { }
5798
5804 Kernel& operator = (const cl_kernel& rhs)
5805 {
5806 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
5807 return *this;
5808 }
5809
5810
5811
5812
5813 template <typename T>
5814 cl_int getInfo(cl_kernel_info name, T* param) const
5815 {
5816 return detail::errHandler(
5817 detail::getInfo(&::clGetKernelInfo, object_, name, param),
5818 __GET_KERNEL_INFO_ERR);
5819 }
5820
5821 template <cl_kernel_info name> typename
5822 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_kernel_info, name>::param_type
5823 getInfo(cl_int* err = nullptr) const
5824 {
5825 typename detail::param_traits<
5826 detail::cl_kernel_info, name>::param_type param;
5827 cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
5828 if (err != nullptr) {
5829 *err = result;
5830 }
5831 return param;
5832 }
5833
5834#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
5835 template <typename T>
5836 cl_int getArgInfo(cl_uint argIndex, cl_kernel_arg_info name, T* param) const
5837 {
5838 return detail::errHandler(
5839 detail::getInfo(&::clGetKernelArgInfo, object_, argIndex, name, param),
5840 __GET_KERNEL_ARG_INFO_ERR);
5841 }
5842
5843 template <cl_kernel_arg_info name> typename
5844 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_kernel_arg_info, name>::param_type
5845 getArgInfo(cl_uint argIndex, cl_int* err = nullptr) const
5846 {
5847 typename detail::param_traits<
5848 detail::cl_kernel_arg_info, name>::param_type param;
5849 cl_int result = getArgInfo(argIndex, name, &param);
5850 if (err != nullptr) {
5851 *err = result;
5852 }
5853 return param;
5854 }
5855#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
5856
5857 template <typename T>
5858 cl_int getWorkGroupInfo(
5859 const Device& device, cl_kernel_work_group_info name, T* param) const
5860 {
5861 return detail::errHandler(
5862 detail::getInfo(
5863 &::clGetKernelWorkGroupInfo, object_, device(), name, param),
5864 __GET_KERNEL_WORK_GROUP_INFO_ERR);
5865 }
5866
5867 template <cl_kernel_work_group_info name> typename
5868 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_kernel_work_group_info, name>::param_type
5869 getWorkGroupInfo(const Device& device, cl_int* err = nullptr) const
5870 {
5871 typename detail::param_traits<
5872 detail::cl_kernel_work_group_info, name>::param_type param;
5873 cl_int result = getWorkGroupInfo(device, name, &param);
5874 if (err != nullptr) {
5875 *err = result;
5876 }
5877 return param;
5878 }
5879
5880#if defined(CL_HPP_USE_CL_SUB_GROUPS_KHR) || CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
5881 cl_int getSubGroupInfo(const cl::Device &dev, cl_kernel_sub_group_info name, const cl::NDRange &range, size_type* param) const
5882 {
5883#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
5884
5885 return detail::errHandler(
5886 clGetKernelSubGroupInfo(object_, dev(), name, range.size(), range.get(), sizeof(size_type), param, nullptr),
5887 __GET_KERNEL_SUB_GROUP_INFO_ERR);
5888
5889#else // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
5890
5891 typedef clGetKernelSubGroupInfoKHR_fn PFN_clGetKernelSubGroupInfoKHR;
5892 static PFN_clGetKernelSubGroupInfoKHR pfn_clGetKernelSubGroupInfoKHR = nullptr;
5893 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clGetKernelSubGroupInfoKHR);
5894
5895 return detail::errHandler(
5896 pfn_clGetKernelSubGroupInfoKHR(object_, dev(), name, range.size(), range.get(), sizeof(size_type), param, nullptr),
5897 __GET_KERNEL_SUB_GROUP_INFO_ERR);
5898
5899#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
5900 }
5901
5902 template <cl_kernel_sub_group_info name>
5903 size_type getSubGroupInfo(const cl::Device &dev, const cl::NDRange &range, cl_int* err = nullptr) const
5904 {
5905 size_type param;
5906 cl_int result = getSubGroupInfo(dev, name, range, &param);
5907 if (err != nullptr) {
5908 *err = result;
5909 }
5910 return param;
5911 }
5912#endif // defined(CL_HPP_USE_CL_SUB_GROUPS_KHR) || CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
5913
5914#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
5917 template<typename T, class D>
5918 cl_int setArg(cl_uint index, const cl::pointer<T, D> &argPtr)
5919 {
5920 return detail::errHandler(
5921 ::clSetKernelArgSVMPointer(object_, index, argPtr.get()),
5922 __SET_KERNEL_ARGS_ERR);
5923 }
5924
5927 template<typename T, class Alloc>
5928 cl_int setArg(cl_uint index, const cl::vector<T, Alloc> &argPtr)
5929 {
5930 return detail::errHandler(
5931 ::clSetKernelArgSVMPointer(object_, index, argPtr.data()),
5932 __SET_KERNEL_ARGS_ERR);
5933 }
5934
5937 template<typename T>
5938 typename std::enable_if<std::is_pointer<T>::value, cl_int>::type
5939 setArg(cl_uint index, const T argPtr)
5940 {
5941 return detail::errHandler(
5942 ::clSetKernelArgSVMPointer(object_, index, argPtr),
5943 __SET_KERNEL_ARGS_ERR);
5944 }
5945#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
5946
5949 template <typename T>
5950 typename std::enable_if<!std::is_pointer<T>::value, cl_int>::type
5951 setArg(cl_uint index, const T &value)
5952 {
5953 return detail::errHandler(
5954 ::clSetKernelArg(
5955 object_,
5956 index,
5957 detail::KernelArgumentHandler<T>::size(value),
5958 detail::KernelArgumentHandler<T>::ptr(value)),
5959 __SET_KERNEL_ARGS_ERR);
5960 }
5961
5962 cl_int setArg(cl_uint index, size_type size, const void* argPtr)
5963 {
5964 return detail::errHandler(
5965 ::clSetKernelArg(object_, index, size, argPtr),
5966 __SET_KERNEL_ARGS_ERR);
5967 }
5968
5969#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
5974 cl_int setSVMPointers(const vector<void*> &pointerList)
5975 {
5976 return detail::errHandler(
5977 ::clSetKernelExecInfo(
5978 object_,
5979 CL_KERNEL_EXEC_INFO_SVM_PTRS,
5980 sizeof(void*)*pointerList.size(),
5981 pointerList.data()));
5982 }
5983
5988 template<int ArrayLength>
5989 cl_int setSVMPointers(const std::array<void*, ArrayLength> &pointerList)
5990 {
5991 return detail::errHandler(
5992 ::clSetKernelExecInfo(
5993 object_,
5994 CL_KERNEL_EXEC_INFO_SVM_PTRS,
5995 sizeof(void*)*pointerList.size(),
5996 pointerList.data()));
5997 }
5998
6010 cl_int enableFineGrainedSystemSVM(bool svmEnabled)
6011 {
6012 cl_bool svmEnabled_ = svmEnabled ? CL_TRUE : CL_FALSE;
6013 return detail::errHandler(
6014 ::clSetKernelExecInfo(
6015 object_,
6016 CL_KERNEL_EXEC_INFO_SVM_FINE_GRAIN_SYSTEM,
6017 sizeof(cl_bool),
6018 &svmEnabled_
6019 )
6020 );
6021 }
6022
6023 template<int index, int ArrayLength, class D, typename T0, typename T1, typename... Ts>
6024 void setSVMPointersHelper(std::array<void*, ArrayLength> &pointerList, const pointer<T0, D> &t0, const pointer<T1, D> &t1, Ts & ... ts)
6025 {
6026 pointerList[index] = static_cast<void*>(t0.get());
6027 setSVMPointersHelper<index + 1, ArrayLength>(pointerList, t1, ts...);
6028 }
6029
6030 template<int index, int ArrayLength, typename T0, typename T1, typename... Ts>
6031 typename std::enable_if<std::is_pointer<T0>::value, void>::type
6032 setSVMPointersHelper(std::array<void*, ArrayLength> &pointerList, T0 t0, T1 t1, Ts... ts)
6033 {
6034 pointerList[index] = static_cast<void*>(t0);
6035 setSVMPointersHelper<index + 1, ArrayLength>(pointerList, t1, ts...);
6036 }
6037
6038 template<int index, int ArrayLength, typename T0, class D>
6039 void setSVMPointersHelper(std::array<void*, ArrayLength> &pointerList, const pointer<T0, D> &t0)
6040 {
6041 pointerList[index] = static_cast<void*>(t0.get());
6042 }
6043
6044
6045 template<int index, int ArrayLength, typename T0>
6046 typename std::enable_if<std::is_pointer<T0>::value, void>::type
6047 setSVMPointersHelper(std::array<void*, ArrayLength> &pointerList, T0 t0)
6048 {
6049 pointerList[index] = static_cast<void*>(t0);
6050 }
6051
6052 template<typename T0, typename... Ts>
6053 cl_int setSVMPointers(const T0 &t0, Ts & ... ts)
6054 {
6055 std::array<void*, 1 + sizeof...(Ts)> pointerList;
6056
6057 setSVMPointersHelper<0, 1 + sizeof...(Ts)>(pointerList, t0, ts...);
6058 return detail::errHandler(
6059 ::clSetKernelExecInfo(
6060 object_,
6061 CL_KERNEL_EXEC_INFO_SVM_PTRS,
6062 sizeof(void*)*(1 + sizeof...(Ts)),
6063 pointerList.data()));
6064 }
6065
6066 template<typename T>
6067 cl_int setExecInfo(cl_kernel_exec_info param_name, const T& val)
6068 {
6069 return detail::errHandler(
6070 ::clSetKernelExecInfo(
6071 object_,
6072 param_name,
6073 sizeof(T),
6074 &val));
6075 }
6076
6077 template<cl_kernel_exec_info name>
6078 cl_int setExecInfo(typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_kernel_exec_info, name>::param_type& val)
6079 {
6080 return setExecInfo(name, val);
6081 }
6082#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
6083
6084#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6090 Kernel clone()
6091 {
6092 cl_int error;
6093 Kernel retValue(clCloneKernel(this->get(), &error));
6094
6095 detail::errHandler(error, __CLONE_KERNEL_ERR);
6096 return retValue;
6097 }
6098#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6099};
6100
6104class Program : public detail::Wrapper<cl_program>
6105{
6106public:
6107#if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6108 typedef vector<vector<unsigned char>> Binaries;
6109 typedef vector<string> Sources;
6110#else // #if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6111 typedef vector<std::pair<const void*, size_type> > Binaries;
6112 typedef vector<std::pair<const char*, size_type> > Sources;
6113#endif // #if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6114
6115 Program(
6116 const string& source,
6117 bool build = false,
6118 cl_int* err = nullptr)
6119 {
6120 cl_int error;
6121
6122 const char * strings = source.c_str();
6123 const size_type length = source.size();
6124
6125 Context context = Context::getDefault(err);
6126
6127 object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithSource(
6128 context(), (cl_uint)1, &strings, &length, &error);
6129
6130 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_SOURCE_ERR);
6131
6132 if (error == CL_SUCCESS && build) {
6133
6134 error = ::clBuildProgram(
6135 object_,
6136 0,
6137 nullptr,
6138#if !defined(CL_HPP_CL_1_2_DEFAULT_BUILD)
6139 "-cl-std=CL2.0",
6140#else
6141 "",
6142#endif // #if !defined(CL_HPP_CL_1_2_DEFAULT_BUILD)
6143 nullptr,
6144 nullptr);
6145
6146 detail::buildErrHandler(error, __BUILD_PROGRAM_ERR, getBuildInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BUILD_LOG>());
6147 }
6148
6149 if (err != nullptr) {
6150 *err = error;
6151 }
6152 }
6153
6154 Program(
6155 const Context& context,
6156 const string& source,
6157 bool build = false,
6158 cl_int* err = nullptr)
6159 {
6160 cl_int error;
6161
6162 const char * strings = source.c_str();
6163 const size_type length = source.size();
6164
6165 object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithSource(
6166 context(), (cl_uint)1, &strings, &length, &error);
6167
6168 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_SOURCE_ERR);
6169
6170 if (error == CL_SUCCESS && build) {
6171 error = ::clBuildProgram(
6172 object_,
6173 0,
6174 nullptr,
6175#if !defined(CL_HPP_CL_1_2_DEFAULT_BUILD)
6176 "-cl-std=CL2.0",
6177#else
6178 "",
6179#endif // #if !defined(CL_HPP_CL_1_2_DEFAULT_BUILD)
6180 nullptr,
6181 nullptr);
6182
6183 detail::buildErrHandler(error, __BUILD_PROGRAM_ERR, getBuildInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BUILD_LOG>());
6184 }
6185
6186 if (err != nullptr) {
6187 *err = error;
6188 }
6189 }
6190
6195 Program(
6196 const Sources& sources,
6197 cl_int* err = nullptr)
6198 {
6199 cl_int error;
6200 Context context = Context::getDefault(err);
6201
6202 const size_type n = (size_type)sources.size();
6203
6204 vector<size_type> lengths(n);
6205 vector<const char*> strings(n);
6206
6207 for (size_type i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
6208#if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6209 strings[i] = sources[(int)i].data();
6210 lengths[i] = sources[(int)i].length();
6211#else // #if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6212 strings[i] = sources[(int)i].first;
6213 lengths[i] = sources[(int)i].second;
6214#endif // #if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6215 }
6216
6217 object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithSource(
6218 context(), (cl_uint)n, strings.data(), lengths.data(), &error);
6219
6220 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_SOURCE_ERR);
6221 if (err != nullptr) {
6222 *err = error;
6223 }
6224 }
6225
6230 Program(
6231 const Context& context,
6232 const Sources& sources,
6233 cl_int* err = nullptr)
6234 {
6235 cl_int error;
6236
6237 const size_type n = (size_type)sources.size();
6238
6239 vector<size_type> lengths(n);
6240 vector<const char*> strings(n);
6241
6242 for (size_type i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
6243#if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6244 strings[i] = sources[(int)i].data();
6245 lengths[i] = sources[(int)i].length();
6246#else // #if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6247 strings[i] = sources[(int)i].first;
6248 lengths[i] = sources[(int)i].second;
6249#endif // #if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6250 }
6251
6252 object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithSource(
6253 context(), (cl_uint)n, strings.data(), lengths.data(), &error);
6254
6255 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_SOURCE_ERR);
6256 if (err != nullptr) {
6257 *err = error;
6258 }
6259 }
6260
6261
6262#if defined(CL_HPP_USE_IL_KHR) || CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6268 Program(
6269 const vector<char>& IL,
6270 bool build = false,
6271 cl_int* err = nullptr)
6272 {
6273 cl_int error;
6274
6275 Context context = Context::getDefault(err);
6276
6277#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6278
6279 object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithIL(
6280 context(), static_cast<const void*>(IL.data()), IL.size(), &error);
6281
6282#else // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6283
6284 typedef clCreateProgramWithILKHR_fn PFN_clCreateProgramWithILKHR;
6285 static PFN_clCreateProgramWithILKHR pfn_clCreateProgramWithILKHR = nullptr;
6286 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clCreateProgramWithILKHR);
6287
6288 object_ = pfn_clCreateProgramWithILKHR(
6289 context(), static_cast<const void*>(IL.data()), IL.size(), &error);
6290
6291#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6292
6293 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_IL_ERR);
6294
6295 if (error == CL_SUCCESS && build) {
6296
6297 error = ::clBuildProgram(
6298 object_,
6299 0,
6300 nullptr,
6301#if !defined(CL_HPP_CL_1_2_DEFAULT_BUILD)
6302 "-cl-std=CL2.0",
6303#else
6304 "",
6305#endif // #if !defined(CL_HPP_CL_1_2_DEFAULT_BUILD)
6306 nullptr,
6307 nullptr);
6308
6309 detail::buildErrHandler(error, __BUILD_PROGRAM_ERR, getBuildInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BUILD_LOG>());
6310 }
6311
6312 if (err != nullptr) {
6313 *err = error;
6314 }
6315 }
6316
6323 Program(
6324 const Context& context,
6325 const vector<char>& IL,
6326 bool build = false,
6327 cl_int* err = nullptr)
6328 {
6329 cl_int error;
6330
6331#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6332
6333 object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithIL(
6334 context(), static_cast<const void*>(IL.data()), IL.size(), &error);
6335
6336#else // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6337
6338 typedef clCreateProgramWithILKHR_fn PFN_clCreateProgramWithILKHR;
6339 static PFN_clCreateProgramWithILKHR pfn_clCreateProgramWithILKHR = nullptr;
6340 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clCreateProgramWithILKHR);
6341
6342 object_ = pfn_clCreateProgramWithILKHR(
6343 context(), static_cast<const void*>(IL.data()), IL.size(), &error);
6344
6345#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6346
6347 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_IL_ERR);
6348
6349 if (error == CL_SUCCESS && build) {
6350 error = ::clBuildProgram(
6351 object_,
6352 0,
6353 nullptr,
6354#if !defined(CL_HPP_CL_1_2_DEFAULT_BUILD)
6355 "-cl-std=CL2.0",
6356#else
6357 "",
6358#endif // #if !defined(CL_HPP_CL_1_2_DEFAULT_BUILD)
6359 nullptr,
6360 nullptr);
6361
6362 detail::buildErrHandler(error, __BUILD_PROGRAM_ERR, getBuildInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BUILD_LOG>());
6363 }
6364
6365 if (err != nullptr) {
6366 *err = error;
6367 }
6368 }
6369#endif // defined(CL_HPP_USE_IL_KHR) || CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
6370
6390 Program(
6391 const Context& context,
6392 const vector<Device>& devices,
6393 const Binaries& binaries,
6394 vector<cl_int>* binaryStatus = nullptr,
6395 cl_int* err = nullptr)
6396 {
6397 cl_int error;
6398
6399 const size_type numDevices = devices.size();
6400
6401 // Catch size mismatch early and return
6402 if(binaries.size() != numDevices) {
6403 error = CL_INVALID_VALUE;
6404 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_BINARY_ERR);
6405 if (err != nullptr) {
6406 *err = error;
6407 }
6408 return;
6409 }
6410
6411
6412 vector<size_type> lengths(numDevices);
6413 vector<const unsigned char*> images(numDevices);
6414#if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6415 for (size_type i = 0; i < numDevices; ++i) {
6416 images[i] = binaries[i].data();
6417 lengths[i] = binaries[(int)i].size();
6418 }
6419#else // #if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6420 for (size_type i = 0; i < numDevices; ++i) {
6421 images[i] = (const unsigned char*)binaries[i].first;
6422 lengths[i] = binaries[(int)i].second;
6423 }
6424#endif // #if !defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_PROGRAM_CONSTRUCTION_FROM_ARRAY_COMPATIBILITY)
6425
6426 vector<cl_device_id> deviceIDs(numDevices);
6427 for( size_type deviceIndex = 0; deviceIndex < numDevices; ++deviceIndex ) {
6428 deviceIDs[deviceIndex] = (devices[deviceIndex])();
6429 }
6430
6431 if(binaryStatus) {
6432 binaryStatus->resize(numDevices);
6433 }
6434
6435 object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithBinary(
6436 context(), (cl_uint) devices.size(),
6437 deviceIDs.data(),
6438 lengths.data(), images.data(), (binaryStatus != nullptr && numDevices > 0)
6439 ? &binaryStatus->front()
6440 : nullptr, &error);
6441
6442 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_BINARY_ERR);
6443 if (err != nullptr) {
6444 *err = error;
6445 }
6446 }
6447
6448
6449#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
6454 Program(
6455 const Context& context,
6456 const vector<Device>& devices,
6457 const string& kernelNames,
6458 cl_int* err = nullptr)
6459 {
6460 cl_int error;
6461
6462
6463 size_type numDevices = devices.size();
6464 vector<cl_device_id> deviceIDs(numDevices);
6465 for( size_type deviceIndex = 0; deviceIndex < numDevices; ++deviceIndex ) {
6466 deviceIDs[deviceIndex] = (devices[deviceIndex])();
6467 }
6468
6469 object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithBuiltInKernels(
6470 context(),
6471 (cl_uint) devices.size(),
6472 deviceIDs.data(),
6473 kernelNames.c_str(),
6474 &error);
6475
6476 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_BUILT_IN_KERNELS_ERR);
6477 if (err != nullptr) {
6478 *err = error;
6479 }
6480 }
6481#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
6482
6483 Program() { }
6484
6485
6492 explicit Program(const cl_program& program, bool retainObject = false) :
6493 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(program, retainObject) { }
6494
6495 Program& operator = (const cl_program& rhs)
6496 {
6497 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
6498 return *this;
6499 }
6500
6501
6502 cl_int build(
6503 const vector<Device>& devices,
6504 const char* options = nullptr,
6505 void (CL_CALLBACK * notifyFptr)(cl_program, void *) = nullptr,
6506 void* data = nullptr) const
6507 {
6508 size_type numDevices = devices.size();
6509 vector<cl_device_id> deviceIDs(numDevices);
6510
6511 for( size_type deviceIndex = 0; deviceIndex < numDevices; ++deviceIndex ) {
6512 deviceIDs[deviceIndex] = (devices[deviceIndex])();
6513 }
6514
6515 cl_int buildError = ::clBuildProgram(
6516 object_,
6517 (cl_uint)
6518 devices.size(),
6519 deviceIDs.data(),
6520 options,
6521 notifyFptr,
6522 data);
6523
6524 return detail::buildErrHandler(buildError, __BUILD_PROGRAM_ERR, getBuildInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BUILD_LOG>());
6525 }
6526
6527 cl_int build(
6528 const Device& device,
6529 const char* options = nullptr,
6530 void (CL_CALLBACK * notifyFptr)(cl_program, void *) = nullptr,
6531 void* data = nullptr) const
6532 {
6533 cl_device_id deviceID = device();
6534
6535 cl_int buildError = ::clBuildProgram(
6536 object_,
6537 1,
6538 &deviceID,
6539 options,
6540 notifyFptr,
6541 data);
6542
6543 BuildLogType buildLog(0);
6544 buildLog.push_back(std::make_pair(device, getBuildInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BUILD_LOG>(device)));
6545 return detail::buildErrHandler(buildError, __BUILD_PROGRAM_ERR, buildLog);
6546 }
6547
6548 cl_int build(
6549 const char* options = nullptr,
6550 void (CL_CALLBACK * notifyFptr)(cl_program, void *) = nullptr,
6551 void* data = nullptr) const
6552 {
6553 cl_int buildError = ::clBuildProgram(
6554 object_,
6555 0,
6556 nullptr,
6557 options,
6558 notifyFptr,
6559 data);
6560
6561 return detail::buildErrHandler(buildError, __BUILD_PROGRAM_ERR, getBuildInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BUILD_LOG>());
6562 }
6563
6564#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
6565 cl_int compile(
6566 const char* options = nullptr,
6567 void (CL_CALLBACK * notifyFptr)(cl_program, void *) = nullptr,
6568 void* data = nullptr) const
6569 {
6570 cl_int error = ::clCompileProgram(
6571 object_,
6572 0,
6573 nullptr,
6574 options,
6575 0,
6576 nullptr,
6577 nullptr,
6578 notifyFptr,
6579 data);
6580 return detail::buildErrHandler(error, __COMPILE_PROGRAM_ERR, getBuildInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BUILD_LOG>());
6581 }
6582#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
6583
6584 template <typename T>
6585 cl_int getInfo(cl_program_info name, T* param) const
6586 {
6587 return detail::errHandler(
6588 detail::getInfo(&::clGetProgramInfo, object_, name, param),
6589 __GET_PROGRAM_INFO_ERR);
6590 }
6591
6592 template <cl_program_info name> typename
6593 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_program_info, name>::param_type
6594 getInfo(cl_int* err = nullptr) const
6595 {
6596 typename detail::param_traits<
6597 detail::cl_program_info, name>::param_type param;
6598 cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
6599 if (err != nullptr) {
6600 *err = result;
6601 }
6602 return param;
6603 }
6604
6605 template <typename T>
6606 cl_int getBuildInfo(
6607 const Device& device, cl_program_build_info name, T* param) const
6608 {
6609 return detail::errHandler(
6610 detail::getInfo(
6611 &::clGetProgramBuildInfo, object_, device(), name, param),
6612 __GET_PROGRAM_BUILD_INFO_ERR);
6613 }
6614
6615 template <cl_program_build_info name> typename
6616 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_program_build_info, name>::param_type
6617 getBuildInfo(const Device& device, cl_int* err = nullptr) const
6618 {
6619 typename detail::param_traits<
6620 detail::cl_program_build_info, name>::param_type param;
6621 cl_int result = getBuildInfo(device, name, &param);
6622 if (err != nullptr) {
6623 *err = result;
6624 }
6625 return param;
6626 }
6627
6633 template <cl_program_build_info name>
6634 vector<std::pair<cl::Device, typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_program_build_info, name>::param_type>>
6635 getBuildInfo(cl_int *err = nullptr) const
6636 {
6637 cl_int result = CL_SUCCESS;
6638
6639 auto devs = getInfo<CL_PROGRAM_DEVICES>(&result);
6640 vector<std::pair<cl::Device, typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_program_build_info, name>::param_type>>
6641 devInfo;
6642
6643 // If there was an initial error from getInfo return the error
6644 if (result != CL_SUCCESS) {
6645 if (err != nullptr) {
6646 *err = result;
6647 }
6648 return devInfo;
6649 }
6650
6651 for (const cl::Device &d : devs) {
6652 typename detail::param_traits<
6653 detail::cl_program_build_info, name>::param_type param;
6654 result = getBuildInfo(d, name, &param);
6655 devInfo.push_back(
6656 std::pair<cl::Device, typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_program_build_info, name>::param_type>
6657 (d, param));
6658 if (result != CL_SUCCESS) {
6659 // On error, leave the loop and return the error code
6660 break;
6661 }
6662 }
6663 if (err != nullptr) {
6664 *err = result;
6665 }
6666 if (result != CL_SUCCESS) {
6667 devInfo.clear();
6668 }
6669 return devInfo;
6670 }
6671
6672 cl_int createKernels(vector<Kernel>* kernels)
6673 {
6674 cl_uint numKernels;
6675 cl_int err = ::clCreateKernelsInProgram(object_, 0, nullptr, &numKernels);
6676 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
6677 return detail::errHandler(err, __CREATE_KERNELS_IN_PROGRAM_ERR);
6678 }
6679
6680 vector<cl_kernel> value(numKernels);
6681
6682 err = ::clCreateKernelsInProgram(
6683 object_, numKernels, value.data(), nullptr);
6684 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
6685 return detail::errHandler(err, __CREATE_KERNELS_IN_PROGRAM_ERR);
6686 }
6687
6688 if (kernels) {
6689 kernels->resize(value.size());
6690
6691 // Assign to param, constructing with retain behaviour
6692 // to correctly capture each underlying CL object
6693 for (size_type i = 0; i < value.size(); i++) {
6694 // We do not need to retain because this kernel is being created
6695 // by the runtime
6696 (*kernels)[i] = Kernel(value[i], false);
6697 }
6698 }
6699 return CL_SUCCESS;
6700 }
6701
6702#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 220
6703#if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_2_2_APIS)
6714 CL_API_PREFIX__VERSION_2_2_DEPRECATED cl_int setReleaseCallback(
6715 void (CL_CALLBACK * pfn_notify)(cl_program program, void * user_data),
6716 void * user_data = nullptr) CL_API_SUFFIX__VERSION_2_2_DEPRECATED
6717 {
6718 return detail::errHandler(
6719 ::clSetProgramReleaseCallback(
6720 object_,
6721 pfn_notify,
6722 user_data),
6723 __SET_PROGRAM_RELEASE_CALLBACK_ERR);
6724 }
6725#endif // #if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_2_2_APIS)
6726
6731 template <typename T>
6732 typename std::enable_if<!std::is_pointer<T>::value, cl_int>::type
6733 setSpecializationConstant(cl_uint index, const T &value)
6734 {
6735 return detail::errHandler(
6736 ::clSetProgramSpecializationConstant(
6737 object_,
6738 index,
6739 sizeof(value),
6740 &value),
6741 __SET_PROGRAM_SPECIALIZATION_CONSTANT_ERR);
6742 }
6743
6748 cl_int setSpecializationConstant(cl_uint index, size_type size, const void* value)
6749 {
6750 return detail::errHandler(
6751 ::clSetProgramSpecializationConstant(
6752 object_,
6753 index,
6754 size,
6755 value),
6756 __SET_PROGRAM_SPECIALIZATION_CONSTANT_ERR);
6757 }
6758#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 220
6759};
6760
6761#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
6762inline Program linkProgram(
6763 const Program& input1,
6764 const Program& input2,
6765 const char* options = nullptr,
6766 void (CL_CALLBACK * notifyFptr)(cl_program, void *) = nullptr,
6767 void* data = nullptr,
6768 cl_int* err = nullptr)
6769{
6770 cl_int error_local = CL_SUCCESS;
6771 cl_program programs[2] = { input1(), input2() };
6772
6773 Context ctx = input1.getInfo<CL_PROGRAM_CONTEXT>(&error_local);
6774 if(error_local!=CL_SUCCESS) {
6775 detail::errHandler(error_local, __LINK_PROGRAM_ERR);
6776 }
6777
6778 cl_program prog = ::clLinkProgram(
6779 ctx(),
6780 0,
6781 nullptr,
6782 options,
6783 2,
6784 programs,
6785 notifyFptr,
6786 data,
6787 &error_local);
6788
6789 detail::errHandler(error_local,__COMPILE_PROGRAM_ERR);
6790 if (err != nullptr) {
6791 *err = error_local;
6792 }
6793
6794 return Program(prog);
6795}
6796
6797inline Program linkProgram(
6798 const vector<Program>& inputPrograms,
6799 const char* options = nullptr,
6800 void (CL_CALLBACK * notifyFptr)(cl_program, void *) = nullptr,
6801 void* data = nullptr,
6802 cl_int* err = nullptr)
6803{
6804 cl_int error_local = CL_SUCCESS;
6805 Context ctx;
6806
6807 static_assert(sizeof(cl::Program) == sizeof(cl_program),
6808 "Size of cl::Program must be equal to size of cl_program");
6809
6810 if(inputPrograms.size() > 0) {
6811 ctx = inputPrograms[0].getInfo<CL_PROGRAM_CONTEXT>(&error_local);
6812 if(error_local!=CL_SUCCESS) {
6813 detail::errHandler(error_local, __LINK_PROGRAM_ERR);
6814 }
6815 }
6816
6817 cl_program prog = ::clLinkProgram(
6818 ctx(),
6819 0,
6820 nullptr,
6821 options,
6822 static_cast<cl_uint>(inputPrograms.size()),
6823 reinterpret_cast<const cl_program *>(inputPrograms.data()),
6824 notifyFptr,
6825 data,
6826 &error_local);
6827
6828 detail::errHandler(error_local,__COMPILE_PROGRAM_ERR);
6829 if (err != nullptr) {
6830 *err = error_local;
6831 }
6832
6833 return Program(prog);
6834}
6835#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
6836
6837// Template specialization for CL_PROGRAM_BINARIES
6838template <>
6839inline cl_int cl::Program::getInfo(cl_program_info name, vector<vector<unsigned char>>* param) const
6840{
6841 if (name != CL_PROGRAM_BINARIES) {
6842 return CL_INVALID_VALUE;
6843 }
6844 if (param) {
6845 // Resize the parameter array appropriately for each allocation
6846 // and pass down to the helper
6847
6848 vector<size_type> sizes = getInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BINARY_SIZES>();
6849 size_type numBinaries = sizes.size();
6850
6851 // Resize the parameter array and constituent arrays
6852 param->resize(numBinaries);
6853 for (size_type i = 0; i < numBinaries; ++i) {
6854 (*param)[i].resize(sizes[i]);
6855 }
6856
6857 return detail::errHandler(
6858 detail::getInfo(&::clGetProgramInfo, object_, name, param),
6859 __GET_PROGRAM_INFO_ERR);
6860 }
6861
6862 return CL_SUCCESS;
6863}
6864
6865template<>
6866inline vector<vector<unsigned char>> cl::Program::getInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BINARIES>(cl_int* err) const
6867{
6868 vector<vector<unsigned char>> binariesVectors;
6869
6870 cl_int result = getInfo(CL_PROGRAM_BINARIES, &binariesVectors);
6871 if (err != nullptr) {
6872 *err = result;
6873 }
6874 return binariesVectors;
6875}
6876
6877#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 220
6878// Template specialization for clSetProgramSpecializationConstant
6879template <>
6880inline cl_int cl::Program::setSpecializationConstant(cl_uint index, const bool &value)
6881{
6882 cl_uchar ucValue = value ? CL_UCHAR_MAX : 0;
6883 return detail::errHandler(
6884 ::clSetProgramSpecializationConstant(
6885 object_,
6886 index,
6887 sizeof(ucValue),
6888 &ucValue),
6889 __SET_PROGRAM_SPECIALIZATION_CONSTANT_ERR);
6890}
6891#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 220
6892
6893inline Kernel::Kernel(const Program& program, const char* name, cl_int* err)
6894{
6895 cl_int error;
6896
6897 object_ = ::clCreateKernel(program(), name, &error);
6898 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_KERNEL_ERR);
6899
6900 if (err != nullptr) {
6901 *err = error;
6902 }
6903
6904}
6905
6906#ifdef cl_khr_external_memory
6907enum class ExternalMemoryType : cl_external_memory_handle_type_khr
6908{
6909 None = 0,
6910
6911 OpaqueFd = CL_EXTERNAL_MEMORY_HANDLE_OPAQUE_FD_KHR,
6912 OpaqueWin32 = CL_EXTERNAL_MEMORY_HANDLE_OPAQUE_WIN32_KHR,
6913 OpaqueWin32Kmt = CL_EXTERNAL_MEMORY_HANDLE_OPAQUE_WIN32_KMT_KHR,
6914
6915 D3D11Texture = CL_EXTERNAL_MEMORY_HANDLE_D3D11_TEXTURE_KHR,
6916 D3D11TextureKmt = CL_EXTERNAL_MEMORY_HANDLE_D3D11_TEXTURE_KMT_KHR,
6917
6918 D3D12Heap = CL_EXTERNAL_MEMORY_HANDLE_D3D12_HEAP_KHR,
6919 D3D12Resource = CL_EXTERNAL_MEMORY_HANDLE_D3D12_RESOURCE_KHR,
6920
6921 DmaBuf = CL_EXTERNAL_MEMORY_HANDLE_DMA_BUF_KHR,
6922};
6923#endif
6924
6925enum class QueueProperties : cl_command_queue_properties
6926{
6927 None = 0,
6928 Profiling = CL_QUEUE_PROFILING_ENABLE,
6929 OutOfOrder = CL_QUEUE_OUT_OF_ORDER_EXEC_MODE_ENABLE,
6930};
6931
6932inline QueueProperties operator|(QueueProperties lhs, QueueProperties rhs)
6933{
6934 return static_cast<QueueProperties>(static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(lhs) | static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(rhs));
6935}
6936
6937inline QueueProperties operator&(QueueProperties lhs, QueueProperties rhs)
6938{
6939 return static_cast<QueueProperties>(static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(lhs) & static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(rhs));
6940}
6941
6945class CommandQueue : public detail::Wrapper<cl_command_queue>
6946{
6947private:
6948 static std::once_flag default_initialized_;
6949 static CommandQueue default_;
6950 static cl_int default_error_;
6951
6957 static void makeDefault()
6958 {
6959 /* We don't want to throw an error from this function, so we have to
6960 * catch and set the error flag.
6961 */
6962#if defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_EXCEPTIONS)
6963 try
6964#endif
6965 {
6966 int error;
6967 Context context = Context::getDefault(&error);
6968
6969 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
6970 default_error_ = error;
6971 }
6972 else {
6973 Device device = Device::getDefault();
6974 default_ = CommandQueue(context, device, 0, &default_error_);
6975 }
6976 }
6977#if defined(CL_HPP_ENABLE_EXCEPTIONS)
6978 catch (cl::Error &e) {
6979 default_error_ = e.err();
6980 }
6981#endif
6982 }
6983
6989 static void makeDefaultProvided(const CommandQueue &c) {
6990 default_ = c;
6991 }
6992
6993#ifdef cl_khr_external_memory
6994 static std::once_flag ext_memory_initialized_;
6995
6996 static void initMemoryExtension(const cl::Device& device)
6997 {
6998 auto platform = device.getInfo<CL_DEVICE_PLATFORM>()();
6999
7000 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clEnqueueAcquireExternalMemObjectsKHR);
7001 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clEnqueueReleaseExternalMemObjectsKHR);
7002
7003 if ((pfn_clEnqueueAcquireExternalMemObjectsKHR == nullptr)
7004 && (pfn_clEnqueueReleaseExternalMemObjectsKHR == nullptr))
7005 {
7006 detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_VALUE, __ENQUEUE_ACQUIRE_EXTERNAL_MEMORY_ERR);
7007 }
7008 }
7009#endif // cl_khr_external_memory
7010
7011public:
7012#ifdef CL_HPP_UNIT_TEST_ENABLE
7019 static void unitTestClearDefault() {
7020 default_ = CommandQueue();
7021 }
7022#endif // #ifdef CL_HPP_UNIT_TEST_ENABLE
7023
7024
7029 CommandQueue(
7030 cl_command_queue_properties properties,
7031 cl_int* err = nullptr)
7032 {
7033 cl_int error;
7034
7035 Context context = Context::getDefault(&error);
7036 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_CONTEXT_ERR);
7037
7038 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
7039 if (err != nullptr) {
7040 *err = error;
7041 }
7042 }
7043 else {
7044 Device device = context.getInfo<CL_CONTEXT_DEVICES>()[0];
7045 bool useWithProperties;
7046
7047#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200 && CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7048 // Run-time decision based on the actual platform
7049 {
7050 cl_uint version = detail::getContextPlatformVersion(context());
7051 useWithProperties = (version >= 0x20000); // OpenCL 2.0 or above
7052 }
7053#elif CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7054 useWithProperties = true;
7055#else
7056 useWithProperties = false;
7057#endif
7058
7059#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7060 if (useWithProperties) {
7061 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
7062 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, properties, 0 };
7063 if ((properties & CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE) == 0) {
7064 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
7065 context(), device(), queue_properties, &error);
7066 }
7067 else {
7068 error = CL_INVALID_QUEUE_PROPERTIES;
7069 }
7070
7071 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
7072 if (err != nullptr) {
7073 *err = error;
7074 }
7075 }
7076#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7077#if CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7078 if (!useWithProperties) {
7079 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueue(
7080 context(), device(), properties, &error);
7081
7082 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
7083 if (err != nullptr) {
7084 *err = error;
7085 }
7086 }
7087#endif // CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7088 }
7089 }
7090
7095 CommandQueue(
7096 QueueProperties properties,
7097 cl_int* err = nullptr)
7098 {
7099 cl_int error;
7100
7101 Context context = Context::getDefault(&error);
7102 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_CONTEXT_ERR);
7103
7104 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
7105 if (err != nullptr) {
7106 *err = error;
7107 }
7108 }
7109 else {
7110 Device device = context.getInfo<CL_CONTEXT_DEVICES>()[0];
7111 bool useWithProperties;
7112
7113#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200 && CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7114 // Run-time decision based on the actual platform
7115 {
7116 cl_uint version = detail::getContextPlatformVersion(context());
7117 useWithProperties = (version >= 0x20000); // OpenCL 2.0 or above
7118 }
7119#elif CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7120 useWithProperties = true;
7121#else
7122 useWithProperties = false;
7123#endif
7124
7125#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7126 if (useWithProperties) {
7127 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
7128 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, static_cast<cl_queue_properties>(properties), 0 };
7129
7130 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
7131 context(), device(), queue_properties, &error);
7132
7133 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
7134 if (err != nullptr) {
7135 *err = error;
7136 }
7137 }
7138#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7139#if CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7140 if (!useWithProperties) {
7141 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueue(
7142 context(), device(), static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(properties), &error);
7143
7144 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
7145 if (err != nullptr) {
7146 *err = error;
7147 }
7148 }
7149#endif // CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7150
7151 }
7152 }
7153
7158 explicit CommandQueue(
7159 const Context& context,
7160 cl_command_queue_properties properties = 0,
7161 cl_int* err = nullptr)
7162 {
7163 cl_int error;
7164 bool useWithProperties;
7165 vector<cl::Device> devices;
7166 error = context.getInfo(CL_CONTEXT_DEVICES, &devices);
7167
7168 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_CONTEXT_ERR);
7169
7170 if (error != CL_SUCCESS)
7171 {
7172 if (err != nullptr) {
7173 *err = error;
7174 }
7175 return;
7176 }
7177
7178#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200 && CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7179 // Run-time decision based on the actual platform
7180 {
7181 cl_uint version = detail::getContextPlatformVersion(context());
7182 useWithProperties = (version >= 0x20000); // OpenCL 2.0 or above
7183 }
7184#elif CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7185 useWithProperties = true;
7186#else
7187 useWithProperties = false;
7188#endif
7189
7190#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7191 if (useWithProperties) {
7192 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
7193 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, properties, 0 };
7194 if ((properties & CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE) == 0) {
7195 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
7196 context(), devices[0](), queue_properties, &error);
7197 }
7198 else {
7199 error = CL_INVALID_QUEUE_PROPERTIES;
7200 }
7201
7202 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
7203 if (err != nullptr) {
7204 *err = error;
7205 }
7206 }
7207#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7208#if CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7209 if (!useWithProperties) {
7210 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueue(
7211 context(), devices[0](), properties, &error);
7212
7213 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
7214 if (err != nullptr) {
7215 *err = error;
7216 }
7217 }
7218#endif // CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7219 }
7220
7225 explicit CommandQueue(
7226 const Context& context,
7227 QueueProperties properties,
7228 cl_int* err = nullptr)
7229 {
7230 cl_int error;
7231 bool useWithProperties;
7232 vector<cl::Device> devices;
7233 error = context.getInfo(CL_CONTEXT_DEVICES, &devices);
7234
7235 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_CONTEXT_ERR);
7236
7237 if (error != CL_SUCCESS)
7238 {
7239 if (err != nullptr) {
7240 *err = error;
7241 }
7242 return;
7243 }
7244
7245#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200 && CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7246 // Run-time decision based on the actual platform
7247 {
7248 cl_uint version = detail::getContextPlatformVersion(context());
7249 useWithProperties = (version >= 0x20000); // OpenCL 2.0 or above
7250 }
7251#elif CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7252 useWithProperties = true;
7253#else
7254 useWithProperties = false;
7255#endif
7256
7257#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7258 if (useWithProperties) {
7259 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
7260 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, static_cast<cl_queue_properties>(properties), 0 };
7261 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
7262 context(), devices[0](), queue_properties, &error);
7263
7264 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
7265 if (err != nullptr) {
7266 *err = error;
7267 }
7268 }
7269#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7270#if CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7271 if (!useWithProperties) {
7272 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueue(
7273 context(), devices[0](), static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(properties), &error);
7274
7275 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
7276 if (err != nullptr) {
7277 *err = error;
7278 }
7279 }
7280#endif // CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7281 }
7282
7287 CommandQueue(
7288 const Context& context,
7289 const Device& device,
7290 cl_command_queue_properties properties = 0,
7291 cl_int* err = nullptr)
7292 {
7293 cl_int error;
7294 bool useWithProperties;
7295
7296#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200 && CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7297 // Run-time decision based on the actual platform
7298 {
7299 cl_uint version = detail::getContextPlatformVersion(context());
7300 useWithProperties = (version >= 0x20000); // OpenCL 2.0 or above
7301 }
7302#elif CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7303 useWithProperties = true;
7304#else
7305 useWithProperties = false;
7306#endif
7307
7308#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7309 if (useWithProperties) {
7310 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
7311 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, properties, 0 };
7312 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
7313 context(), device(), queue_properties, &error);
7314
7315 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
7316 if (err != nullptr) {
7317 *err = error;
7318 }
7319 }
7320#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7321#if CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7322 if (!useWithProperties) {
7323 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueue(
7324 context(), device(), properties, &error);
7325
7326 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
7327 if (err != nullptr) {
7328 *err = error;
7329 }
7330 }
7331#endif // CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7332 }
7333
7338 CommandQueue(
7339 const Context& context,
7340 const Device& device,
7341 QueueProperties properties,
7342 cl_int* err = nullptr)
7343 {
7344 cl_int error;
7345 bool useWithProperties;
7346
7347#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200 && CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7348 // Run-time decision based on the actual platform
7349 {
7350 cl_uint version = detail::getContextPlatformVersion(context());
7351 useWithProperties = (version >= 0x20000); // OpenCL 2.0 or above
7352 }
7353#elif CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7354 useWithProperties = true;
7355#else
7356 useWithProperties = false;
7357#endif
7358
7359#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7360 if (useWithProperties) {
7361 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
7362 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, static_cast<cl_queue_properties>(properties), 0 };
7363 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
7364 context(), device(), queue_properties, &error);
7365
7366 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
7367 if (err != nullptr) {
7368 *err = error;
7369 }
7370 }
7371#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7372#if CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7373 if (!useWithProperties) {
7374 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueue(
7375 context(), device(), static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(properties), &error);
7376
7377 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
7378 if (err != nullptr) {
7379 *err = error;
7380 }
7381 }
7382#endif // CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 200
7383 }
7384
7385 static CommandQueue getDefault(cl_int * err = nullptr)
7386 {
7387 std::call_once(default_initialized_, makeDefault);
7388#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7389 detail::errHandler(default_error_, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
7390#else // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7391 detail::errHandler(default_error_, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
7392#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
7393 if (err != nullptr) {
7394 *err = default_error_;
7395 }
7396 return default_;
7397 }
7398
7406 static CommandQueue setDefault(const CommandQueue &default_queue)
7407 {
7408 std::call_once(default_initialized_, makeDefaultProvided, std::cref(default_queue));
7409 detail::errHandler(default_error_);
7410 return default_;
7411 }
7412
7413 CommandQueue() { }
7414
7415
7422 explicit CommandQueue(const cl_command_queue& commandQueue, bool retainObject = false) :
7423 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(commandQueue, retainObject) { }
7424
7425 CommandQueue& operator = (const cl_command_queue& rhs)
7426 {
7427 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
7428 return *this;
7429 }
7430
7431 template <typename T>
7432 cl_int getInfo(cl_command_queue_info name, T* param) const
7433 {
7434 return detail::errHandler(
7435 detail::getInfo(
7436 &::clGetCommandQueueInfo, object_, name, param),
7437 __GET_COMMAND_QUEUE_INFO_ERR);
7438 }
7439
7440 template <cl_command_queue_info name> typename
7441 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_command_queue_info, name>::param_type
7442 getInfo(cl_int* err = nullptr) const
7443 {
7444 typename detail::param_traits<
7445 detail::cl_command_queue_info, name>::param_type param;
7446 cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
7447 if (err != nullptr) {
7448 *err = result;
7449 }
7450 return param;
7451 }
7452
7453 cl_int enqueueReadBuffer(
7454 const Buffer& buffer,
7455 cl_bool blocking,
7456 size_type offset,
7457 size_type size,
7458 void* ptr,
7459 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
7460 Event* event = nullptr) const
7461 {
7462 cl_event tmp;
7463 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
7464 ::clEnqueueReadBuffer(
7465 object_, buffer(), blocking, offset, size,
7466 ptr,
7467 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
7468 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
7469 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
7470 __ENQUEUE_READ_BUFFER_ERR);
7471
7472 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
7473 *event = tmp;
7474
7475 return err;
7476 }
7477
7478 cl_int enqueueWriteBuffer(
7479 const Buffer& buffer,
7480 cl_bool blocking,
7481 size_type offset,
7482 size_type size,
7483 const void* ptr,
7484 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
7485 Event* event = nullptr) const
7486 {
7487 cl_event tmp;
7488 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
7489 ::clEnqueueWriteBuffer(
7490 object_, buffer(), blocking, offset, size,
7491 ptr,
7492 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
7493 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
7494 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
7495 __ENQUEUE_WRITE_BUFFER_ERR);
7496
7497 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
7498 *event = tmp;
7499
7500 return err;
7501 }
7502
7503 cl_int enqueueCopyBuffer(
7504 const Buffer& src,
7505 const Buffer& dst,
7506 size_type src_offset,
7507 size_type dst_offset,
7508 size_type size,
7509 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
7510 Event* event = nullptr) const
7511 {
7512 cl_event tmp;
7513 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
7514 ::clEnqueueCopyBuffer(
7515 object_, src(), dst(), src_offset, dst_offset, size,
7516 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
7517 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
7518 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
7519 __ENQEUE_COPY_BUFFER_ERR);
7520
7521 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
7522 *event = tmp;
7523
7524 return err;
7525 }
7526#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 110
7527 cl_int enqueueReadBufferRect(
7528 const Buffer& buffer,
7529 cl_bool blocking,
7530 const array<size_type, 3>& buffer_offset,
7531 const array<size_type, 3>& host_offset,
7532 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
7533 size_type buffer_row_pitch,
7534 size_type buffer_slice_pitch,
7535 size_type host_row_pitch,
7536 size_type host_slice_pitch,
7537 void *ptr,
7538 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
7539 Event* event = nullptr) const
7540 {
7541 cl_event tmp;
7542 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
7543 ::clEnqueueReadBufferRect(
7544 object_,
7545 buffer(),
7546 blocking,
7547 buffer_offset.data(),
7548 host_offset.data(),
7549 region.data(),
7550 buffer_row_pitch,
7551 buffer_slice_pitch,
7552 host_row_pitch,
7553 host_slice_pitch,
7554 ptr,
7555 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
7556 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
7557 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
7558 __ENQUEUE_READ_BUFFER_RECT_ERR);
7559
7560 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
7561 *event = tmp;
7562
7563 return err;
7564 }
7565
7566 cl_int enqueueReadBufferRect(
7567 const Buffer& buffer,
7568 cl_bool blocking,
7569 const array<size_type, 2>& buffer_offset,
7570 const array<size_type, 2>& host_offset,
7571 const array<size_type, 2>& region,
7572 size_type buffer_row_pitch,
7573 size_type buffer_slice_pitch,
7574 size_type host_row_pitch,
7575 size_type host_slice_pitch,
7576 void* ptr,
7577 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
7578 Event* event = nullptr) const
7579 {
7580 return enqueueReadBufferRect(
7581 buffer,
7582 blocking,
7583 { buffer_offset[0], buffer_offset[1], 0 },
7584 { host_offset[0], host_offset[1], 0 },
7585 { region[0], region[1], 1 },
7586 buffer_row_pitch,
7587 buffer_slice_pitch,
7588 host_row_pitch,
7589 host_slice_pitch,
7590 ptr,
7591 events,
7592 event);
7593 }
7594
7595 cl_int enqueueWriteBufferRect(
7596 const Buffer& buffer,
7597 cl_bool blocking,
7598 const array<size_type, 3>& buffer_offset,
7599 const array<size_type, 3>& host_offset,
7600 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
7601 size_type buffer_row_pitch,
7602 size_type buffer_slice_pitch,
7603 size_type host_row_pitch,
7604 size_type host_slice_pitch,
7605 const void *ptr,
7606 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
7607 Event* event = nullptr) const
7608 {
7609 cl_event tmp;
7610 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
7611 ::clEnqueueWriteBufferRect(
7612 object_,
7613 buffer(),
7614 blocking,
7615 buffer_offset.data(),
7616 host_offset.data(),
7617 region.data(),
7618 buffer_row_pitch,
7619 buffer_slice_pitch,
7620 host_row_pitch,
7621 host_slice_pitch,
7622 ptr,
7623 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
7624 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
7625 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
7626 __ENQUEUE_WRITE_BUFFER_RECT_ERR);
7627
7628 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
7629 *event = tmp;
7630
7631 return err;
7632 }
7633
7634 cl_int enqueueWriteBufferRect(
7635 const Buffer& buffer,
7636 cl_bool blocking,
7637 const array<size_type, 2>& buffer_offset,
7638 const array<size_type, 2>& host_offset,
7639 const array<size_type, 2>& region,
7640 size_type buffer_row_pitch,
7641 size_type buffer_slice_pitch,
7642 size_type host_row_pitch,
7643 size_type host_slice_pitch,
7644 const void* ptr,
7645 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
7646 Event* event = nullptr) const
7647 {
7648 return enqueueWriteBufferRect(
7649 buffer,
7650 blocking,
7651 { buffer_offset[0], buffer_offset[1], 0 },
7652 { host_offset[0], host_offset[1], 0 },
7653 { region[0], region[1], 1 },
7654 buffer_row_pitch,
7655 buffer_slice_pitch,
7656 host_row_pitch,
7657 host_slice_pitch,
7658 ptr,
7659 events,
7660 event);
7661 }
7662
7663 cl_int enqueueCopyBufferRect(
7664 const Buffer& src,
7665 const Buffer& dst,
7666 const array<size_type, 3>& src_origin,
7667 const array<size_type, 3>& dst_origin,
7668 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
7669 size_type src_row_pitch,
7670 size_type src_slice_pitch,
7671 size_type dst_row_pitch,
7672 size_type dst_slice_pitch,
7673 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
7674 Event* event = nullptr) const
7675 {
7676 cl_event tmp;
7677 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
7678 ::clEnqueueCopyBufferRect(
7679 object_,
7680 src(),
7681 dst(),
7682 src_origin.data(),
7683 dst_origin.data(),
7684 region.data(),
7685 src_row_pitch,
7686 src_slice_pitch,
7687 dst_row_pitch,
7688 dst_slice_pitch,
7689 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
7690 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
7691 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
7692 __ENQEUE_COPY_BUFFER_RECT_ERR);
7693
7694 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
7695 *event = tmp;
7696
7697 return err;
7698 }
7699
7700 cl_int enqueueCopyBufferRect(
7701 const Buffer& src,
7702 const Buffer& dst,
7703 const array<size_type, 2>& src_origin,
7704 const array<size_type, 2>& dst_origin,
7705 const array<size_type, 2>& region,
7706 size_type src_row_pitch,
7707 size_type src_slice_pitch,
7708 size_type dst_row_pitch,
7709 size_type dst_slice_pitch,
7710 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
7711 Event* event = nullptr) const
7712 {
7713 return enqueueCopyBufferRect(
7714 src,
7715 dst,
7716 { src_origin[0], src_origin[1], 0 },
7717 { dst_origin[0], dst_origin[1], 0 },
7718 { region[0], region[1], 1 },
7719 src_row_pitch,
7720 src_slice_pitch,
7721 dst_row_pitch,
7722 dst_slice_pitch,
7723 events,
7724 event);
7725 }
7726
7727#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 110
7728#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
7740 template<typename PatternType>
7741 cl_int enqueueFillBuffer(
7742 const Buffer& buffer,
7743 PatternType pattern,
7744 size_type offset,
7745 size_type size,
7746 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
7747 Event* event = nullptr) const
7748 {
7749 cl_event tmp;
7750 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
7751 ::clEnqueueFillBuffer(
7752 object_,
7753 buffer(),
7754 static_cast<void*>(&pattern),
7755 sizeof(PatternType),
7756 offset,
7757 size,
7758 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
7759 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
7760 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
7761 __ENQUEUE_FILL_BUFFER_ERR);
7762
7763 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
7764 *event = tmp;
7765
7766 return err;
7767 }
7768#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
7769
7770 cl_int enqueueReadImage(
7771 const Image& image,
7772 cl_bool blocking,
7773 const array<size_type, 3>& origin,
7774 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
7775 size_type row_pitch,
7776 size_type slice_pitch,
7777 void* ptr,
7778 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
7779 Event* event = nullptr) const
7780 {
7781 cl_event tmp;
7782 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
7783 ::clEnqueueReadImage(
7784 object_,
7785 image(),
7786 blocking,
7787 origin.data(),
7788 region.data(),
7789 row_pitch,
7790 slice_pitch,
7791 ptr,
7792 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
7793 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
7794 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
7795 __ENQUEUE_READ_IMAGE_ERR);
7796
7797 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
7798 *event = tmp;
7799
7800 return err;
7801 }
7802
7803 cl_int enqueueReadImage(
7804 const Image& image,
7805 cl_bool blocking,
7806 const array<size_type, 2>& origin,
7807 const array<size_type, 2>& region,
7808 size_type row_pitch,
7809 size_type slice_pitch,
7810 void* ptr,
7811 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
7812 Event* event = nullptr) const
7813 {
7814 return enqueueReadImage(
7815 image,
7816 blocking,
7817 { origin[0], origin[1], 0 },
7818 { region[0], region[1], 1 },
7819 row_pitch,
7820 slice_pitch,
7821 ptr,
7822 events,
7823 event);
7824 }
7825
7826 cl_int enqueueWriteImage(
7827 const Image& image,
7828 cl_bool blocking,
7829 const array<size_type, 3>& origin,
7830 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
7831 size_type row_pitch,
7832 size_type slice_pitch,
7833 const void* ptr,
7834 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
7835 Event* event = nullptr) const
7836 {
7837 cl_event tmp;
7838 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
7839 ::clEnqueueWriteImage(
7840 object_,
7841 image(),
7842 blocking,
7843 origin.data(),
7844 region.data(),
7845 row_pitch,
7846 slice_pitch,
7847 ptr,
7848 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
7849 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
7850 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
7851 __ENQUEUE_WRITE_IMAGE_ERR);
7852
7853 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
7854 *event = tmp;
7855
7856 return err;
7857 }
7858
7859 cl_int enqueueWriteImage(
7860 const Image& image,
7861 cl_bool blocking,
7862 const array<size_type, 2>& origin,
7863 const array<size_type, 2>& region,
7864 size_type row_pitch,
7865 size_type slice_pitch,
7866 const void* ptr,
7867 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
7868 Event* event = nullptr) const
7869 {
7870 return enqueueWriteImage(
7871 image,
7872 blocking,
7873 { origin[0], origin[1], 0 },
7874 { region[0], region[1], 1 },
7875 row_pitch,
7876 slice_pitch,
7877 ptr,
7878 events,
7879 event);
7880 }
7881
7882 cl_int enqueueCopyImage(
7883 const Image& src,
7884 const Image& dst,
7885 const array<size_type, 3>& src_origin,
7886 const array<size_type, 3>& dst_origin,
7887 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
7888 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
7889 Event* event = nullptr) const
7890 {
7891 cl_event tmp;
7892 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
7893 ::clEnqueueCopyImage(
7894 object_,
7895 src(),
7896 dst(),
7897 src_origin.data(),
7898 dst_origin.data(),
7899 region.data(),
7900 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
7901 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
7902 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
7903 __ENQUEUE_COPY_IMAGE_ERR);
7904
7905 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
7906 *event = tmp;
7907
7908 return err;
7909 }
7910
7911 cl_int enqueueCopyImage(
7912 const Image& src,
7913 const Image& dst,
7914 const array<size_type, 2>& src_origin,
7915 const array<size_type, 2>& dst_origin,
7916 const array<size_type, 2>& region,
7917 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
7918 Event* event = nullptr) const
7919 {
7920 return enqueueCopyImage(
7921 src,
7922 dst,
7923 { src_origin[0], src_origin[1], 0 },
7924 { dst_origin[0], dst_origin[1], 0 },
7925 { region[0], region[1], 1 },
7926 events,
7927 event);
7928 }
7929
7930#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
7938 template <typename T>
7939 typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<T, cl_float4>::value ||
7940 std::is_same<T, cl_int4 >::value ||
7941 std::is_same<T, cl_uint4 >::value,
7942 cl_int>::type
7943 enqueueFillImage(
7944 const Image& image,
7945 T fillColor,
7946 const array<size_type, 3>& origin,
7947 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
7948 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
7949 Event* event = nullptr) const
7950 {
7951 cl_event tmp;
7952 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
7953 ::clEnqueueFillImage(
7954 object_,
7955 image(),
7956 static_cast<void*>(&fillColor),
7957 origin.data(),
7958 region.data(),
7959 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint)events->size() : 0,
7960 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*)&events->front() : NULL,
7961 (event != NULL) ? &tmp : nullptr),
7962 __ENQUEUE_FILL_IMAGE_ERR);
7963
7964 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS) *event = tmp;
7965
7966 return err;
7967 }
7968
7976 template <typename T>
7977 typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<T, cl_float4>::value ||
7978 std::is_same<T, cl_int4 >::value ||
7979 std::is_same<T, cl_uint4 >::value, cl_int>::type
7980 enqueueFillImage(
7981 const Image& image,
7982 T fillColor,
7983 const array<size_type, 2>& origin,
7984 const array<size_type, 2>& region,
7985 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
7986 Event* event = nullptr) const
7987 {
7988 return enqueueFillImage(
7989 image,
7990 fillColor,
7991 { origin[0], origin[1], 0 },
7992 { region[0], region[1], 1 },
7993 events,
7994 event
7995 );
7996 }
7997#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
7998
7999 cl_int enqueueCopyImageToBuffer(
8000 const Image& src,
8001 const Buffer& dst,
8002 const array<size_type, 3>& src_origin,
8003 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
8004 size_type dst_offset,
8005 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8006 Event* event = nullptr) const
8007 {
8008 cl_event tmp;
8009 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8010 ::clEnqueueCopyImageToBuffer(
8011 object_,
8012 src(),
8013 dst(),
8014 src_origin.data(),
8015 region.data(),
8016 dst_offset,
8017 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8018 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
8019 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
8020 __ENQUEUE_COPY_IMAGE_TO_BUFFER_ERR);
8021
8022 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8023 *event = tmp;
8024
8025 return err;
8026 }
8027
8028 cl_int enqueueCopyImageToBuffer(
8029 const Image& src,
8030 const Buffer& dst,
8031 const array<size_type, 2>& src_origin,
8032 const array<size_type, 2>& region,
8033 size_type dst_offset,
8034 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8035 Event* event = nullptr) const
8036 {
8037 return enqueueCopyImageToBuffer(
8038 src,
8039 dst,
8040 { src_origin[0], src_origin[1], 0 },
8041 { region[0], region[1], 1 },
8042 dst_offset,
8043 events,
8044 event);
8045 }
8046
8047 cl_int enqueueCopyBufferToImage(
8048 const Buffer& src,
8049 const Image& dst,
8050 size_type src_offset,
8051 const array<size_type, 3>& dst_origin,
8052 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
8053 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8054 Event* event = nullptr) const
8055 {
8056 cl_event tmp;
8057 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8058 ::clEnqueueCopyBufferToImage(
8059 object_,
8060 src(),
8061 dst(),
8062 src_offset,
8063 dst_origin.data(),
8064 region.data(),
8065 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8066 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
8067 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
8068 __ENQUEUE_COPY_BUFFER_TO_IMAGE_ERR);
8069
8070 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8071 *event = tmp;
8072
8073 return err;
8074 }
8075
8076 cl_int enqueueCopyBufferToImage(
8077 const Buffer& src,
8078 const Image& dst,
8079 size_type src_offset,
8080 const array<size_type, 2>& dst_origin,
8081 const array<size_type, 2>& region,
8082 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8083 Event* event = nullptr) const
8084 {
8085 return enqueueCopyBufferToImage(
8086 src,
8087 dst,
8088 src_offset,
8089 { dst_origin[0], dst_origin[1], 0 },
8090 { region[0], region[1], 1 },
8091 events,
8092 event);
8093 }
8094
8095 void* enqueueMapBuffer(
8096 const Buffer& buffer,
8097 cl_bool blocking,
8098 cl_map_flags flags,
8099 size_type offset,
8100 size_type size,
8101 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8102 Event* event = nullptr,
8103 cl_int* err = nullptr) const
8104 {
8105 cl_event tmp;
8106 cl_int error;
8107 void * result = ::clEnqueueMapBuffer(
8108 object_, buffer(), blocking, flags, offset, size,
8109 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8110 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
8111 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr,
8112 &error);
8113
8114 detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
8115 if (err != nullptr) {
8116 *err = error;
8117 }
8118 if (event != nullptr && error == CL_SUCCESS)
8119 *event = tmp;
8120
8121 return result;
8122 }
8123
8124 void* enqueueMapImage(
8125 const Image& image,
8126 cl_bool blocking,
8127 cl_map_flags flags,
8128 const array<size_type, 3>& origin,
8129 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
8130 size_type * row_pitch,
8131 size_type * slice_pitch,
8132 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8133 Event* event = nullptr,
8134 cl_int* err = nullptr) const
8135 {
8136 cl_event tmp;
8137 cl_int error;
8138 void * result = ::clEnqueueMapImage(
8139 object_, image(), blocking, flags,
8140 origin.data(),
8141 region.data(),
8142 row_pitch, slice_pitch,
8143 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8144 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
8145 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr,
8146 &error);
8147
8148 detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_IMAGE_ERR);
8149 if (err != nullptr) {
8150 *err = error;
8151 }
8152 if (event != nullptr && error == CL_SUCCESS)
8153 *event = tmp;
8154 return result;
8155 }
8156
8157 void* enqueueMapImage(
8158 const Image& image,
8159 cl_bool blocking,
8160 cl_map_flags flags,
8161 const array<size_type, 2>& origin,
8162 const array<size_type, 2>& region,
8163 size_type* row_pitch,
8164 size_type* slice_pitch,
8165 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8166 Event* event = nullptr,
8167 cl_int* err = nullptr) const
8168 {
8169 return enqueueMapImage(image, blocking, flags,
8170 { origin[0], origin[1], 0 },
8171 { region[0], region[1], 1 }, row_pitch,
8172 slice_pitch, events, event, err);
8173 }
8174
8175#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
8180 template<typename T>
8181 cl_int enqueueMapSVM(
8182 T* ptr,
8183 cl_bool blocking,
8184 cl_map_flags flags,
8185 size_type size,
8186 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8187 Event* event = nullptr) const
8188 {
8189 cl_event tmp;
8190 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(::clEnqueueSVMMap(
8191 object_, blocking, flags, static_cast<void*>(ptr), size,
8192 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint)events->size() : 0,
8193 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*)&events->front() : nullptr,
8194 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
8195 __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
8196
8197 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8198 *event = tmp;
8199
8200 return err;
8201 }
8202

8208 template<typename T, class D>
8209 cl_int enqueueMapSVM(
8210 cl::pointer<T, D> &ptr,
8211 cl_bool blocking,
8212 cl_map_flags flags,
8213 size_type size,
8214 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8215 Event* event = nullptr) const
8216 {
8217 cl_event tmp;
8218 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(::clEnqueueSVMMap(
8219 object_, blocking, flags, static_cast<void*>(ptr.get()), size,
8220 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint)events->size() : 0,
8221 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*)&events->front() : nullptr,
8222 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
8223 __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
8224
8225 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8226 *event = tmp;
8227
8228 return err;
8229 }
8230
8235 template<typename T, class Alloc>
8236 cl_int enqueueMapSVM(
8237 cl::vector<T, Alloc> &container,
8238 cl_bool blocking,
8239 cl_map_flags flags,
8240 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8241 Event* event = nullptr) const
8242 {
8243 cl_event tmp;
8244 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(::clEnqueueSVMMap(
8245 object_, blocking, flags, static_cast<void*>(container.data()), container.size()*sizeof(T),
8246 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint)events->size() : 0,
8247 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*)&events->front() : nullptr,
8248 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
8249 __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
8250
8251 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8252 *event = tmp;
8253
8254 return err;
8255 }

8262 Event* event = nullptr) const
8263 {
8264 cl_event tmp;
8265 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8266 ::clEnqueueUnmapMemObject(
8267 object_, memory(), mapped_ptr,
8268 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8269 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
8270 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
8271 __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR);
8272
8273 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8274 *event = tmp;
8275
8276 return err;
8277 }

8297 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
8298 __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR);
8299
8300 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8301 *event = tmp;
8302
8303 return err;
8304 }

8345 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint)events->size() : 0,
