8357#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
8369 cl_int enqueueMarkerWithWaitList(
8370 const vector<Event> *events = nullptr,
8371 Event *event = nullptr) const
8372 {
8373 cl_event tmp;
8374 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8375 ::clEnqueueMarkerWithWaitList(
8376 object_,
8377 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8378 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
8379 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
8380 __ENQUEUE_MARKER_WAIT_LIST_ERR);
8381
8382 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8383 *event = tmp;
8384
8385 return err;
8386 }
8387
8399 cl_int enqueueBarrierWithWaitList(
8400 const vector<Event> *events = nullptr,
8401 Event *event = nullptr) const
8402 {
8403 cl_event tmp;
8404 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8405 ::clEnqueueBarrierWithWaitList(
8406 object_,
8407 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8408 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
8409 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
8410 __ENQUEUE_BARRIER_WAIT_LIST_ERR);
8411
8412 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8413 *event = tmp;
8414
8415 return err;
8416 }
8417
8422 cl_int enqueueMigrateMemObjects(
8423 const vector<Memory> &memObjects,
8424 cl_mem_migration_flags flags,
8425 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8426 Event* event = nullptr
8427 ) const
8428 {
8429 cl_event tmp;
8430
8431 vector<cl_mem> localMemObjects(memObjects.size());
8432
8433 for( int i = 0; i < (int)memObjects.size(); ++i ) {
8434 localMemObjects[i] = memObjects[i]();
8435 }
8436
8437 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8438 ::clEnqueueMigrateMemObjects(
8439 object_,
8440 (cl_uint)memObjects.size(),
8441 localMemObjects.data(),
8442 flags,
8443 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8444 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
8445 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
8446 __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR);
8447
8448 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8449 *event = tmp;
8450
8451 return err;
8452 }
8453#endif // CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
8454
8455
8456#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
8462 template<typename T>
8463 cl_int enqueueMigrateSVM(
8464 const cl::vector<T*> &svmRawPointers,
8465 const cl::vector<size_type> &sizes,
8466 cl_mem_migration_flags flags = 0,
8467 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8468 Event* event = nullptr) const
8469 {
8470 cl_event tmp;
8471 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(::clEnqueueSVMMigrateMem(
8472 object_,
8473 svmRawPointers.size(), static_cast<void**>(svmRawPointers.data()),
8474 sizes.data(), // array of sizes not passed
8475 flags,
8476 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint)events->size() : 0,
8477 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*)&events->front() : nullptr,
8478 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
8479 __ENQUEUE_MIGRATE_SVM_ERR);
8480
8481 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8482 *event = tmp;
8483
8484 return err;
8485 }
8486
8491 template<typename T>
8492 cl_int enqueueMigrateSVM(
8493 const cl::vector<T*> &svmRawPointers,
8494 cl_mem_migration_flags flags = 0,
8495 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8496 Event* event = nullptr) const
8497 {
8498 return enqueueMigrateSVM(svmRawPointers, cl::vector<size_type>(svmRawPointers.size()), flags, events, event);
8499 }
8500
8501
8507 template<typename T, class D>
8508 cl_int enqueueMigrateSVM(
8509 const cl::vector<cl::pointer<T, D>> &svmPointers,
8510 const cl::vector<size_type> &sizes,
8511 cl_mem_migration_flags flags = 0,
8512 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8513 Event* event = nullptr) const
8514 {
8515 cl::vector<void*> svmRawPointers;
8516 svmRawPointers.reserve(svmPointers.size());
8517 for (auto p : svmPointers) {
8518 svmRawPointers.push_back(static_cast<void*>(p.get()));
8519 }
8520
8521 return enqueueMigrateSVM(svmRawPointers, sizes, flags, events, event);
8522 }
8523
8524
8529 template<typename T, class D>
8530 cl_int enqueueMigrateSVM(
8531 const cl::vector<cl::pointer<T, D>> &svmPointers,
8532 cl_mem_migration_flags flags = 0,
8533 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8534 Event* event = nullptr) const
8535 {
8536 return enqueueMigrateSVM(svmPointers, cl::vector<size_type>(svmPointers.size()), flags, events, event);
8537 }
8538
8544 template<typename T, class Alloc>
8545 cl_int enqueueMigrateSVM(
8546 const cl::vector<cl::vector<T, Alloc>> &svmContainers,
8547 const cl::vector<size_type> &sizes,
8548 cl_mem_migration_flags flags = 0,
8549 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8550 Event* event = nullptr) const
8551 {
8552 cl::vector<void*> svmRawPointers;
8553 svmRawPointers.reserve(svmContainers.size());
8554 for (auto p : svmContainers) {
8555 svmRawPointers.push_back(static_cast<void*>(p.data()));
8556 }
8557
8558 return enqueueMigrateSVM(svmRawPointers, sizes, flags, events, event);
8559 }
8560
8565 template<typename T, class Alloc>
8566 cl_int enqueueMigrateSVM(
8567 const cl::vector<cl::vector<T, Alloc>> &svmContainers,
8568 cl_mem_migration_flags flags = 0,
8569 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8570 Event* event = nullptr) const
8571 {
8572 return enqueueMigrateSVM(svmContainers, cl::vector<size_type>(svmContainers.size()), flags, events, event);
8573 }
8574
8575#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
8576
8577 cl_int enqueueNDRangeKernel(
8578 const Kernel& kernel,
8579 const NDRange& offset,
8580 const NDRange& global,
8581 const NDRange& local = NullRange,
8582 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8583 Event* event = nullptr) const
8584 {
8585 cl_event tmp;
8586 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8587 ::clEnqueueNDRangeKernel(
8588 object_, kernel(), (cl_uint) global.dimensions(),
8589 offset.dimensions() != 0 ? (const size_type*) offset : nullptr,
8590 (const size_type*) global,
8591 local.dimensions() != 0 ? (const size_type*) local : nullptr,
8592 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8593 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
8594 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
8595 __ENQUEUE_NDRANGE_KERNEL_ERR);
8596
8597 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8598 *event = tmp;
8599
8600 return err;
8601 }
8602
8603#if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_2_APIS)
8604 CL_API_PREFIX__VERSION_1_2_DEPRECATED cl_int enqueueTask(
8605 const Kernel& kernel,
8606 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8607 Event* event = nullptr) const CL_API_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_2_DEPRECATED
8608 {
8609 cl_event tmp;
8610 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8611 ::clEnqueueTask(
8612 object_, kernel(),
8613 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8614 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
8615 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
8616 __ENQUEUE_TASK_ERR);
8617
8618 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8619 *event = tmp;
8620
8621 return err;
8622 }
8623#endif // #if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_2_APIS)
8624
8625 cl_int enqueueNativeKernel(
8626 void (CL_CALLBACK *userFptr)(void *),
8627 std::pair<void*, size_type> args,
8628 const vector<Memory>* mem_objects = nullptr,
8629 const vector<const void*>* mem_locs = nullptr,
8630 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8631 Event* event = nullptr) const
8632 {
8633 cl_event tmp;
8634 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8635 ::clEnqueueNativeKernel(
8636 object_, userFptr, args.first, args.second,
8637 (mem_objects != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) mem_objects->size() : 0,
8638 (mem_objects->size() > 0 ) ? reinterpret_cast<const cl_mem *>(mem_objects->data()) : nullptr,
8639 (mem_locs != nullptr && mem_locs->size() > 0) ? (const void **) &mem_locs->front() : nullptr,
8640 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8641 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
8642 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
8643 __ENQUEUE_NATIVE_KERNEL);
8644
8645 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8646 *event = tmp;
8647
8648 return err;
8649 }
8650
8654#if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
8655 CL_API_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
8656 cl_int enqueueMarker(Event* event = nullptr) const CL_API_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
8657 {
8658 cl_event tmp;
8659 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8660 ::clEnqueueMarker(
8661 object_,
8662 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
8663 __ENQUEUE_MARKER_ERR);
8664
8665 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8666 *event = tmp;
8667
8668 return err;
8669 }
8670
8671 CL_API_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
8672 cl_int enqueueWaitForEvents(const vector<Event>& events) const CL_API_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
8673 {
8674 return detail::errHandler(
8675 ::clEnqueueWaitForEvents(
8676 object_,
8677 (cl_uint) events.size(),
8678 events.size() > 0 ? (const cl_event*) &events.front() : nullptr),
8679 __ENQUEUE_WAIT_FOR_EVENTS_ERR);
8680 }
8681#endif // defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
8682
8683 cl_int enqueueAcquireGLObjects(
8684 const vector<Memory>* mem_objects = nullptr,
8685 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8686 Event* event = nullptr) const
8687 {
8688 cl_event tmp;
8689 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8690 ::clEnqueueAcquireGLObjects(
8691 object_,
8692 (mem_objects != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) mem_objects->size() : 0,
8693 (mem_objects != nullptr && mem_objects->size() > 0) ? (const cl_mem *) &mem_objects->front(): nullptr,
8694 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8695 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
8696 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
8697 __ENQUEUE_ACQUIRE_GL_ERR);
8698
8699 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8700 *event = tmp;
8701
8702 return err;
8703 }
8704
8705 cl_int enqueueReleaseGLObjects(
8706 const vector<Memory>* mem_objects = nullptr,
8707 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8708 Event* event = nullptr) const
8709 {
8710 cl_event tmp;
8711 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8712 ::clEnqueueReleaseGLObjects(
8713 object_,
8714 (mem_objects != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) mem_objects->size() : 0,
8715 (mem_objects != nullptr && mem_objects->size() > 0) ? (const cl_mem *) &mem_objects->front(): nullptr,
8716 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8717 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
8718 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
8719 __ENQUEUE_RELEASE_GL_ERR);
8720
8721 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8722 *event = tmp;
8723
8724 return err;
8725 }
8726
8727#if defined (CL_HPP_USE_DX_INTEROP)
8728typedef CL_API_ENTRY cl_int (CL_API_CALL *PFN_clEnqueueAcquireD3D10ObjectsKHR)(
8729 cl_command_queue command_queue, cl_uint num_objects,
8730 const cl_mem* mem_objects, cl_uint num_events_in_wait_list,
8731 const cl_event* event_wait_list, cl_event* event);
8732typedef CL_API_ENTRY cl_int (CL_API_CALL *PFN_clEnqueueReleaseD3D10ObjectsKHR)(
8733 cl_command_queue command_queue, cl_uint num_objects,
8734 const cl_mem* mem_objects, cl_uint num_events_in_wait_list,
8735 const cl_event* event_wait_list, cl_event* event);
8736
8737 cl_int enqueueAcquireD3D10Objects(
8738 const vector<Memory>* mem_objects = nullptr,
8739 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8740 Event* event = nullptr) const
8741 {
8742 static PFN_clEnqueueAcquireD3D10ObjectsKHR pfn_clEnqueueAcquireD3D10ObjectsKHR = nullptr;
8743#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
8744 cl_context context = getInfo<CL_QUEUE_CONTEXT>();
8745 cl::Device device(getInfo<CL_QUEUE_DEVICE>());
8746 cl_platform_id platform = device.getInfo<CL_DEVICE_PLATFORM>();
8747 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clEnqueueAcquireD3D10ObjectsKHR);
8748#endif
8749#if CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 120
8750 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clEnqueueAcquireD3D10ObjectsKHR);
8751#endif
8752
8753 cl_event tmp;
8754 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8755 pfn_clEnqueueAcquireD3D10ObjectsKHR(
8756 object_,
8757 (mem_objects != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) mem_objects->size() : 0,
8758 (mem_objects != nullptr && mem_objects->size() > 0) ? (const cl_mem *) &mem_objects->front(): nullptr,
8759 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8760 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
8761 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
8762 __ENQUEUE_ACQUIRE_GL_ERR);
8763
8764 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8765 *event = tmp;
8766
8767 return err;
8768 }
8769
8770 cl_int enqueueReleaseD3D10Objects(
8771 const vector<Memory>* mem_objects = nullptr,
8772 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
8773 Event* event = nullptr) const
8774 {
8775 static PFN_clEnqueueReleaseD3D10ObjectsKHR pfn_clEnqueueReleaseD3D10ObjectsKHR = nullptr;
8776#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
8777 cl_context context = getInfo<CL_QUEUE_CONTEXT>();
8778 cl::Device device(getInfo<CL_QUEUE_DEVICE>());
8779 cl_platform_id platform = device.getInfo<CL_DEVICE_PLATFORM>();
8780 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clEnqueueReleaseD3D10ObjectsKHR);
8781#endif
8782#if CL_HPP_MINIMUM_OPENCL_VERSION < 120
8783 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clEnqueueReleaseD3D10ObjectsKHR);
8784#endif
8785
8786 cl_event tmp;
8787 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
8788 pfn_clEnqueueReleaseD3D10ObjectsKHR(
8789 object_,
8790 (mem_objects != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) mem_objects->size() : 0,
8791 (mem_objects != nullptr && mem_objects->size() > 0) ? (const cl_mem *) &mem_objects->front(): nullptr,
8792 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
8793 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
8794 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
8795 __ENQUEUE_RELEASE_GL_ERR);
8796
8797 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8798 *event = tmp;
8799
8800 return err;
8801 }
8802#endif
8803
8807#if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
8808 CL_API_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
8809 cl_int enqueueBarrier() const CL_API_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
8810 {
8811 return detail::errHandler(
8812 ::clEnqueueBarrier(object_),
8813 __ENQUEUE_BARRIER_ERR);
8814 }
8815#endif // CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS
8816
8817 cl_int flush() const
8818 {
8819 return detail::errHandler(::clFlush(object_), __FLUSH_ERR);
8820 }
8821
8822 cl_int finish() const
8823 {
8824 return detail::errHandler(::clFinish(object_), __FINISH_ERR);
8825 }
8826
8827#ifdef cl_khr_external_memory
8828 cl_int enqueueAcquireExternalMemObjects(
8829 const vector<Memory>& mem_objects,
8830 const vector<Event>* events_wait = nullptr,
8831 Event *event = nullptr)
8832 {
8833 cl_int err = CL_INVALID_OPERATION;
8834 cl_event tmp;
8835
8836 std::call_once(ext_memory_initialized_, initMemoryExtension, this->getInfo<CL_QUEUE_DEVICE>());
8837
8838 if (pfn_clEnqueueAcquireExternalMemObjectsKHR)
8839 {
8840 err = pfn_clEnqueueAcquireExternalMemObjectsKHR(
8841 object_,
8842 static_cast<cl_uint>(mem_objects.size()),
8843 (mem_objects.size() > 0) ? reinterpret_cast<const cl_mem *>(mem_objects.data()) : nullptr,
8844 (events_wait != nullptr) ? static_cast<cl_uint>(events_wait->size()) : 0,
8845 (events_wait != nullptr && events_wait->size() > 0) ? reinterpret_cast<const cl_event*>(events_wait->data()) : nullptr,
8846 &tmp);
8847 }
8848
8849 detail::errHandler(err, __ENQUEUE_ACQUIRE_EXTERNAL_MEMORY_ERR);
8850
8851 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8852 *event = tmp;
8853
8854 return err;
8855 }
8856
8857 cl_int enqueueReleaseExternalMemObjects(
8858 const vector<Memory>& mem_objects,
8859 const vector<Event>* events_wait = nullptr,
8860 Event *event = nullptr)
8861 {
8862 cl_int err = CL_INVALID_OPERATION;
8863 cl_event tmp;
8864
8865 std::call_once(ext_memory_initialized_, initMemoryExtension, this->getInfo<CL_QUEUE_DEVICE>());
8866
8867 if (pfn_clEnqueueReleaseExternalMemObjectsKHR)
8868 {
8869 err = pfn_clEnqueueReleaseExternalMemObjectsKHR(
8870 object_,
8871 static_cast<cl_uint>(mem_objects.size()),
8872 (mem_objects.size() > 0) ? reinterpret_cast<const cl_mem *>(mem_objects.data()) : nullptr,
8873 (events_wait != nullptr) ? static_cast<cl_uint>(events_wait->size()) : 0,
8874 (events_wait != nullptr && events_wait->size() > 0) ? reinterpret_cast<const cl_event*>(events_wait->data()) : nullptr,
8875 &tmp);
8876 }
8877
8878 detail::errHandler(err, __ENQUEUE_RELEASE_EXTERNAL_MEMORY_ERR);
8879
8880 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
8881 *event = tmp;
8882
8883 return err;
8884 }
8885#endif // cl_khr_external_memory && CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 300
8886
8887#ifdef cl_khr_semaphore
8888 cl_int enqueueWaitSemaphores(
8889 const vector<Semaphore> &sema_objects,
8890 const vector<cl_semaphore_payload_khr> &sema_payloads = {},
8891 const vector<Event>* events_wait_list = nullptr,
8892 Event *event = nullptr) const;
8893
8894 cl_int enqueueSignalSemaphores(
8895 const vector<Semaphore> &sema_objects,
8896 const vector<cl_semaphore_payload_khr>& sema_payloads = {},
8897 const vector<Event>* events_wait_list = nullptr,
8898 Event* event = nullptr);
8899#endif // cl_khr_semaphore
8900}; // CommandQueue
8901
8902#ifdef cl_khr_external_memory
8903CL_HPP_DEFINE_STATIC_MEMBER_ std::once_flag CommandQueue::ext_memory_initialized_;
8904#endif
8905
8906CL_HPP_DEFINE_STATIC_MEMBER_ std::once_flag CommandQueue::default_initialized_;
8907CL_HPP_DEFINE_STATIC_MEMBER_ CommandQueue CommandQueue::default_;
8908CL_HPP_DEFINE_STATIC_MEMBER_ cl_int CommandQueue::default_error_ = CL_SUCCESS;
8909
8910
8911#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
8912enum class DeviceQueueProperties : cl_command_queue_properties
8913{
8914 None = 0,
8915 Profiling = CL_QUEUE_PROFILING_ENABLE,
8916};
8917
8918inline DeviceQueueProperties operator|(DeviceQueueProperties lhs, DeviceQueueProperties rhs)
8919{
8920 return static_cast<DeviceQueueProperties>(static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(lhs) | static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(rhs));
8921}
8922
8926class DeviceCommandQueue : public detail::Wrapper<cl_command_queue>
8927{
8928public:
8929
8933 DeviceCommandQueue() { }
8934
8938 DeviceCommandQueue(DeviceQueueProperties properties, cl_int* err = nullptr)
8939 {
8940 cl_int error;
8941 cl::Context context = cl::Context::getDefault();
8942 cl::Device device = cl::Device::getDefault();
8943
8944 cl_command_queue_properties mergedProperties =
8945 CL_QUEUE_OUT_OF_ORDER_EXEC_MODE_ENABLE | CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE | static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(properties);
8946
8947 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
8948 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, mergedProperties, 0 };
8949 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
8950 context(), device(), queue_properties, &error);
8951
8952 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
8953 if (err != nullptr) {
8954 *err = error;
8955 }
8956 }
8957
8961 DeviceCommandQueue(
8962 const Context& context,
8963 const Device& device,
8964 DeviceQueueProperties properties = DeviceQueueProperties::None,
8965 cl_int* err = nullptr)
8966 {
8967 cl_int error;
8968
8969 cl_command_queue_properties mergedProperties =
8970 CL_QUEUE_OUT_OF_ORDER_EXEC_MODE_ENABLE | CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE | static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(properties);
8971 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
8972 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, mergedProperties, 0 };
8973 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
8974 context(), device(), queue_properties, &error);
8975
8976 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
8977 if (err != nullptr) {
8978 *err = error;
8979 }
8980 }
8981
8985 DeviceCommandQueue(
8986 const Context& context,
8987 const Device& device,
8988 cl_uint queueSize,
8989 DeviceQueueProperties properties = DeviceQueueProperties::None,
8990 cl_int* err = nullptr)
8991 {
8992 cl_int error;
8993
8994 cl_command_queue_properties mergedProperties =
8995 CL_QUEUE_OUT_OF_ORDER_EXEC_MODE_ENABLE | CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE | static_cast<cl_command_queue_properties>(properties);
8996 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
8997 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, mergedProperties,
8998 CL_QUEUE_SIZE, queueSize,
8999 0 };
9000 object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
9001 context(), device(), queue_properties, &error);
9002
9003 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
9004 if (err != nullptr) {
9005 *err = error;
9006 }
9007 }
9008
9015 explicit DeviceCommandQueue(const cl_command_queue& commandQueue, bool retainObject = false) :
9016 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(commandQueue, retainObject) { }
9017
9018 DeviceCommandQueue& operator = (const cl_command_queue& rhs)
9019 {
9020 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
9021 return *this;
9022 }
9023
9024 template <typename T>
9025 cl_int getInfo(cl_command_queue_info name, T* param) const
9026 {
9027 return detail::errHandler(
9028 detail::getInfo(
9029 &::clGetCommandQueueInfo, object_, name, param),
9030 __GET_COMMAND_QUEUE_INFO_ERR);
9031 }
9032
9033 template <cl_command_queue_info name> typename
9034 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_command_queue_info, name>::param_type
9035 getInfo(cl_int* err = nullptr) const
9036 {
9037 typename detail::param_traits<
9038 detail::cl_command_queue_info, name>::param_type param;
9039 cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
9040 if (err != nullptr) {
9041 *err = result;
9042 }
9043 return param;
9044 }
9045
9052 static DeviceCommandQueue makeDefault(
9053 cl_int *err = nullptr)
9054 {
9055 cl_int error;
9056 cl::Context context = cl::Context::getDefault();
9057 cl::Device device = cl::Device::getDefault();
9058
9059 cl_command_queue_properties properties =
9060 CL_QUEUE_OUT_OF_ORDER_EXEC_MODE_ENABLE | CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE | CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE_DEFAULT;
9061 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
9062 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, properties,
9063 0 };
9064 DeviceCommandQueue deviceQueue(
9065 ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
9066 context(), device(), queue_properties, &error));
9067
9068 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
9069 if (err != nullptr) {
9070 *err = error;
9071 }
9072
9073 return deviceQueue;
9074 }
9075
9082 static DeviceCommandQueue makeDefault(
9083 const Context &context, const Device &device, cl_int *err = nullptr)
9084 {
9085 cl_int error;
9086
9087 cl_command_queue_properties properties =
9088 CL_QUEUE_OUT_OF_ORDER_EXEC_MODE_ENABLE | CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE | CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE_DEFAULT;
9089 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
9090 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, properties,
9091 0 };
9092 DeviceCommandQueue deviceQueue(
9093 ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
9094 context(), device(), queue_properties, &error));
9095
9096 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
9097 if (err != nullptr) {
9098 *err = error;
9099 }
9100
9101 return deviceQueue;
9102 }
9103
9110 static DeviceCommandQueue makeDefault(
9111 const Context &context, const Device &device, cl_uint queueSize, cl_int *err = nullptr)
9112 {
9113 cl_int error;
9114
9115 cl_command_queue_properties properties =
9116 CL_QUEUE_OUT_OF_ORDER_EXEC_MODE_ENABLE | CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE | CL_QUEUE_ON_DEVICE_DEFAULT;
9117 cl_queue_properties queue_properties[] = {
9118 CL_QUEUE_PROPERTIES, properties,
9119 CL_QUEUE_SIZE, queueSize,
9120 0 };
9121 DeviceCommandQueue deviceQueue(
9122 ::clCreateCommandQueueWithProperties(
9123 context(), device(), queue_properties, &error));
9124
9125 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
9126 if (err != nullptr) {
9127 *err = error;
9128 }
9129
9130 return deviceQueue;
9131 }
9132
9133
9134
9135#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
9142 static DeviceCommandQueue updateDefault(const Context &context, const Device &device, const DeviceCommandQueue &default_queue, cl_int *err = nullptr)
9143 {
9144 cl_int error;
9145 error = clSetDefaultDeviceCommandQueue(context.get(), device.get(), default_queue.get());
9146
9147 detail::errHandler(error, __SET_DEFAULT_DEVICE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
9148 if (err != nullptr) {
9149 *err = error;
9150 }
9151 return default_queue;
9152 }
9153
9157 static DeviceCommandQueue getDefault(const CommandQueue &queue, cl_int * err = nullptr)
9158 {
9159 return queue.getInfo<CL_QUEUE_DEVICE_DEFAULT>(err);
9160 }
9161
9162#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 210
9163}; // DeviceCommandQueue
9164
9165namespace detail
9166{
9167 // Specialization for device command queue
9168 template <>
9169 struct KernelArgumentHandler<cl::DeviceCommandQueue, void>
9170 {
9171 static size_type size(const cl::DeviceCommandQueue&) { return sizeof(cl_command_queue); }
9172 static const cl_command_queue* ptr(const cl::DeviceCommandQueue& value) { return &(value()); }
9173 };
9174} // namespace detail
9175
9176#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
9177
9178
9179template< typename IteratorType >
9180Buffer::Buffer(
9181 const Context &context,
9182 IteratorType startIterator,
9183 IteratorType endIterator,
9184 bool readOnly,
9185 bool useHostPtr,
9186 cl_int* err)
9187{
9188 typedef typename std::iterator_traits<IteratorType>::value_type DataType;
9189 cl_int error;
9190
9191 cl_mem_flags flags = 0;
9192 if( readOnly ) {
9193 flags |= CL_MEM_READ_ONLY;
9194 }
9195 else {
9196 flags |= CL_MEM_READ_WRITE;
9197 }
9198 if( useHostPtr ) {
9199 flags |= CL_MEM_USE_HOST_PTR;
9200 }
9201
9202 size_type size = sizeof(DataType)*(endIterator - startIterator);
9203
9204 if( useHostPtr ) {
9205 object_ = ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size, const_cast<DataType*>(&*startIterator), &error);
9206 } else {
9207 object_ = ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size, 0, &error);
9208 }
9209
9210 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
9211 if (err != nullptr) {
9212 *err = error;
9213 }
9214
9215 if( !useHostPtr ) {
9216 CommandQueue queue(context, 0, &error);
9217 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
9218 if (err != nullptr) {
9219 *err = error;
9220 }
9221
9222 error = cl::copy(queue, startIterator, endIterator, *this);
9223 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
9224 if (err != nullptr) {
9225 *err = error;
9226 }
9227 }
9228}
9229
9230template< typename IteratorType >
9231Buffer::Buffer(
9232 const CommandQueue &queue,
9233 IteratorType startIterator,
9234 IteratorType endIterator,
9235 bool readOnly,
9236 bool useHostPtr,
9237 cl_int* err)
9238{
9239 typedef typename std::iterator_traits<IteratorType>::value_type DataType;
9240 cl_int error;
9241
9242 cl_mem_flags flags = 0;
9243 if (readOnly) {
9244 flags |= CL_MEM_READ_ONLY;
9245 }
9246 else {
9247 flags |= CL_MEM_READ_WRITE;
9248 }
9249 if (useHostPtr) {
9250 flags |= CL_MEM_USE_HOST_PTR;
9251 }
9252
9253 size_type size = sizeof(DataType)*(endIterator - startIterator);
9254
9255 Context context = queue.getInfo<CL_QUEUE_CONTEXT>();
9256
9257 if (useHostPtr) {
9258 object_ = ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size, const_cast<DataType*>(&*startIterator), &error);
9259 }
9260 else {
9261 object_ = ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size, 0, &error);
9262 }
9263
9264 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
9265 if (err != nullptr) {
9266 *err = error;
9267 }
9268
9269 if (!useHostPtr) {
9270 error = cl::copy(queue, startIterator, endIterator, *this);
9271 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
9272 if (err != nullptr) {
9273 *err = error;
9274 }
9275 }
9276}
9277
9278inline cl_int enqueueReadBuffer(
9279 const Buffer& buffer,
9280 cl_bool blocking,
9281 size_type offset,
9282 size_type size,
9283 void* ptr,
9284 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9285 Event* event = nullptr)
9286{
9287 cl_int error;
9288 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9289
9290 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9291 return error;
9292 }
9293
9294 return queue.enqueueReadBuffer(buffer, blocking, offset, size, ptr, events, event);
9295}
9296
9297inline cl_int enqueueWriteBuffer(
9298 const Buffer& buffer,
9299 cl_bool blocking,
9300 size_type offset,
9301 size_type size,
9302 const void* ptr,
9303 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9304 Event* event = nullptr)
9305{
9306 cl_int error;
9307 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9308
9309 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9310 return error;
9311 }
9312
9313 return queue.enqueueWriteBuffer(buffer, blocking, offset, size, ptr, events, event);
9314}
9315
9316inline void* enqueueMapBuffer(
9317 const Buffer& buffer,
9318 cl_bool blocking,
9319 cl_map_flags flags,
9320 size_type offset,
9321 size_type size,
9322 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9323 Event* event = nullptr,
9324 cl_int* err = nullptr)
9325{
9326 cl_int error;
9327 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9328 detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
9329 if (err != nullptr) {
9330 *err = error;
9331 }
9332
9333 void * result = ::clEnqueueMapBuffer(
9334 queue(), buffer(), blocking, flags, offset, size,
9335 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
9336 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
9337 (cl_event*) event,
9338 &error);
9339
9340 detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
9341 if (err != nullptr) {
9342 *err = error;
9343 }
9344 return result;
9345}
9346
9347
9348#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
9354template<typename T>
9355inline cl_int enqueueMapSVM(
9356 T* ptr,
9357 cl_bool blocking,
9358 cl_map_flags flags,
9359 size_type size,
9360 const vector<Event>* events,
9361 Event* event)
9362{
9363 cl_int error;
9364 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9365 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9366 return detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
9367 }
9368
9369 return queue.enqueueMapSVM(
9370 ptr, blocking, flags, size, events, event);
9371}
9372
9378template<typename T, class D>
9379inline cl_int enqueueMapSVM(
9380 cl::pointer<T, D> &ptr,
9381 cl_bool blocking,
9382 cl_map_flags flags,
9383 size_type size,
9384 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9385 Event* event = nullptr)
9386{
9387 cl_int error;
9388 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9389 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9390 return detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
9391 }
9392
9393 return queue.enqueueMapSVM(
9394 ptr, blocking, flags, size, events, event);
9395}
9396
9402template<typename T, class Alloc>
9403inline cl_int enqueueMapSVM(
9404 cl::vector<T, Alloc> &container,
9405 cl_bool blocking,
9406 cl_map_flags flags,
9407 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9408 Event* event = nullptr)
9409{
9410 cl_int error;
9411 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9412 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9413 return detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
9414 }
9415
9416 return queue.enqueueMapSVM(
9417 container, blocking, flags, events, event);
9418}
9419
9420#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
9421
9422inline cl_int enqueueUnmapMemObject(
9423 const Memory& memory,
9424 void* mapped_ptr,
9425 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9426 Event* event = nullptr)
9427{
9428 cl_int error;
9429 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9430 detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
9431 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9432 return error;
9433 }
9434
9435 cl_event tmp;
9436 cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
9437 ::clEnqueueUnmapMemObject(
9438 queue(), memory(), mapped_ptr,
9439 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint)events->size() : 0,
9440 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*)&events->front() : nullptr,
9441 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr),
9442 __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR);
9443
9444 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
9445 *event = tmp;
9446
9447 return err;
9448}
9449
9450#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
9456template<typename T>
9457inline cl_int enqueueUnmapSVM(
9458 T* ptr,
9459 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9460 Event* event = nullptr)
9461{
9462 cl_int error;
9463 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9464 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9465 return detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR);
9466 }
9467
9468 return detail::errHandler(queue.enqueueUnmapSVM(ptr, events, event),
9469 __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR);
9470
9471}
9472
9478template<typename T, class D>
9479inline cl_int enqueueUnmapSVM(
9480 cl::pointer<T, D> &ptr,
9481 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9482 Event* event = nullptr)
9483{
9484 cl_int error;
9485 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9486 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9487 return detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR);
9488 }
9489
9490 return detail::errHandler(queue.enqueueUnmapSVM(ptr, events, event),
9491 __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR);
9492}
9493

9500inline cl_int enqueueUnmapSVM(
9501 cl::vector<T, Alloc> &container,
9502 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9503 Event* event = nullptr)
9504{
9505 cl_int error;
9506 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9507 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9508 return detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR);
9509 }
9510
9511 return detail::errHandler(queue.enqueueUnmapSVM(container, events, event),
9512 __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR);
9513}

9516
9517inline cl_int enqueueCopyBuffer(
9518 const Buffer& src,
9519 const Buffer& dst,
9520 size_type src_offset,
9521 size_type dst_offset,
9522 size_type size,
9523 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9524 Event* event = nullptr)
9525{
9526 cl_int error;
9527 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9528
9529 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9530 return error;
9531 }
9532
9533 return queue.enqueueCopyBuffer(src, dst, src_offset, dst_offset, size, events, event);
9534}
9535
9541template< typename IteratorType >
9542inline cl_int copy( IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator, cl::Buffer &buffer )
9543{
9544 cl_int error;
9545 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9546 if (error != CL_SUCCESS)
9547 return error;
9548
9549 return cl::copy(queue, startIterator, endIterator, buffer);
9550}
9551
9557template< typename IteratorType >
9558inline cl_int copy( const cl::Buffer &buffer, IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator )
9559{
9560 cl_int error;
9561 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9562 if (error != CL_SUCCESS)
9563 return error;
9564
9565 return cl::copy(queue, buffer, startIterator, endIterator);
9566}
9567
9573template< typename IteratorType >
9574inline cl_int copy( const CommandQueue &queue, IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator, cl::Buffer &buffer )
9575{
9576 typedef typename std::iterator_traits<IteratorType>::value_type DataType;
9577 cl_int error;
9578
9579 size_type length = endIterator-startIterator;
9580 size_type byteLength = length*sizeof(DataType);
9581
9582 DataType *pointer =
9583 static_cast<DataType*>(queue.enqueueMapBuffer(buffer, CL_TRUE, CL_MAP_WRITE, 0, byteLength, 0, 0, &error));
9584 // if exceptions enabled, enqueueMapBuffer will throw
9585 if( error != CL_SUCCESS ) {
9586 return error;
9587 }
9588#if defined(_MSC_VER)
9589 std::copy(
9590 startIterator,
9591 endIterator,
9592 stdext::checked_array_iterator<DataType*>(
9593 pointer, length));
9594#else
9595 std::copy(startIterator, endIterator, pointer);
9596#endif
9597 Event endEvent;
9598 error = queue.enqueueUnmapMemObject(buffer, pointer, 0, &endEvent);
9599 // if exceptions enabled, enqueueUnmapMemObject will throw
9600 if( error != CL_SUCCESS ) {
9601 return error;
9602 }
9603 endEvent.wait();
9604 return CL_SUCCESS;
9605}
9606
9612template< typename IteratorType >
9613inline cl_int copy( const CommandQueue &queue, const cl::Buffer &buffer, IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator )
9614{
9615 typedef typename std::iterator_traits<IteratorType>::value_type DataType;
9616 cl_int error;
9617
9618 size_type length = endIterator-startIterator;
9619 size_type byteLength = length*sizeof(DataType);
9620
9621 DataType *pointer =
9622 static_cast<DataType*>(queue.enqueueMapBuffer(buffer, CL_TRUE, CL_MAP_READ, 0, byteLength, 0, 0, &error));
9623 // if exceptions enabled, enqueueMapBuffer will throw
9624 if( error != CL_SUCCESS ) {
9625 return error;
9626 }
9627 std::copy(pointer, pointer + length, startIterator);
9628 Event endEvent;
9629 error = queue.enqueueUnmapMemObject(buffer, pointer, 0, &endEvent);
9630 // if exceptions enabled, enqueueUnmapMemObject will throw
9631 if( error != CL_SUCCESS ) {
9632 return error;
9633 }
9634 endEvent.wait();
9635 return CL_SUCCESS;
9636}
9637
9638
9639#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
9643template<typename T, class Alloc>
9644inline cl_int mapSVM(cl::vector<T, Alloc> &container)
9645{
9646 return enqueueMapSVM(container, CL_TRUE, CL_MAP_READ | CL_MAP_WRITE);
9647}
9648
9652template<typename T, class Alloc>
9653inline cl_int unmapSVM(cl::vector<T, Alloc> &container)
9654{
9655 return enqueueUnmapSVM(container);
9656}
9657
9658#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
9659
9660#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 110
9661inline cl_int enqueueReadBufferRect(
9662 const Buffer& buffer,
9663 cl_bool blocking,
9664 const array<size_type, 3>& buffer_offset,
9665 const array<size_type, 3>& host_offset,
9666 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
9667 size_type buffer_row_pitch,
9668 size_type buffer_slice_pitch,
9669 size_type host_row_pitch,
9670 size_type host_slice_pitch,
9671 void *ptr,
9672 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9673 Event* event = nullptr)
9674{
9675 cl_int error;
9676 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9677
9678 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9679 return error;
9680 }
9681
9682 return queue.enqueueReadBufferRect(
9683 buffer,
9684 blocking,
9685 buffer_offset,
9686 host_offset,
9687 region,
9688 buffer_row_pitch,
9689 buffer_slice_pitch,
9690 host_row_pitch,
9691 host_slice_pitch,
9692 ptr,
9693 events,
9694 event);
9695}
9696
9697inline cl_int enqueueReadBufferRect(
9698 const Buffer& buffer,
9699 cl_bool blocking,
9700 const array<size_type, 2>& buffer_offset,
9701 const array<size_type, 2>& host_offset,
9702 const array<size_type, 2>& region,
9703 size_type buffer_row_pitch,
9704 size_type buffer_slice_pitch,
9705 size_type host_row_pitch,
9706 size_type host_slice_pitch,
9707 void* ptr,
9708 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9709 Event* event = nullptr)
9710{
9711 return enqueueReadBufferRect(
9712 buffer,
9713 blocking,
9714 { buffer_offset[0], buffer_offset[1], 0 },
9715 { host_offset[0], host_offset[1], 0 },
9716 { region[0], region[1], 1 },
9717 buffer_row_pitch,
9718 buffer_slice_pitch,
9719 host_row_pitch,
9720 host_slice_pitch,
9721 ptr,
9722 events,
9723 event);
9724}
9725

9727 const Buffer& buffer,
9728 cl_bool blocking,
9729 const array<size_type, 3>& buffer_offset,
9730 const array<size_type, 3>& host_offset,
9731 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
9732 size_type buffer_row_pitch,
9733 size_type buffer_slice_pitch,
9734 size_type host_row_pitch,
9735 size_type host_slice_pitch,
9736 const void *ptr,
9737 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9738 Event* event = nullptr)

9744 return error;

9748 buffer,
9749 blocking,
9750 buffer_offset,
9751 host_offset,
9752 region,
9753 buffer_row_pitch,
9754 buffer_slice_pitch,
9755 host_row_pitch,
9756 host_slice_pitch,
9757 ptr,
9758 events,
9759 event);
9760}

9762inline cl_int enqueueWriteBufferRect(
9763 const Buffer& buffer,
9764 cl_bool blocking,
9765 const array<size_type, 2>& buffer_offset,
9766 const array<size_type, 2>& host_offset,
9767 const array<size_type, 2>& region,
9768 size_type buffer_row_pitch,
9769 size_type buffer_slice_pitch,

9772 const void* ptr,
9773 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9774 Event* event = nullptr)
9775{

9777 buffer,
9778 blocking,

9780 { host_offset[0], host_offset[1], 0 },
9781 { region[0], region[1], 1 },

9791inline cl_int enqueueCopyBufferRect(
9792 const Buffer& src,
9793 const Buffer& dst,
9794 const array<size_type, 3>& src_origin,
9795 const array<size_type, 3>& dst_origin,
9796 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
9797 size_type src_row_pitch,
9798 size_type src_slice_pitch,
9799 size_type dst_row_pitch,
9800 size_type dst_slice_pitch,
9801 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9802 Event* event = nullptr)
9803{
9804 cl_int error;
9805 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9806
9807 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9808 return error;
9809 }
9810
9811 return queue.enqueueCopyBufferRect(
9812 src,
9813 dst,
9814 src_origin,
9815 dst_origin,
9816 region,
9817 src_row_pitch,
9818 src_slice_pitch,
9819 dst_row_pitch,
9820 dst_slice_pitch,
9821 events,
9822 event);
9823}

9825inline cl_int enqueueCopyBufferRect(
9826 const Buffer& src,
9827 const Buffer& dst,
9828 const array<size_type, 2>& src_origin,
9829 const array<size_type, 2>& dst_origin,
9830 const array<size_type, 2>& region,
9831 size_type src_row_pitch,
9832 size_type src_slice_pitch,
9833 size_type dst_row_pitch,
9834 size_type dst_slice_pitch,
9835 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9836 Event* event = nullptr)
9837{
9838 return enqueueCopyBufferRect(
9839 src,
9840 dst,
9841 { src_origin[0], src_origin[1], 0 },
9842 { dst_origin[0], dst_origin[1], 0 },
9843 { region[0], region[1], 1 },
9844 src_row_pitch,
9845 src_slice_pitch,
9846 dst_row_pitch,
9847 dst_slice_pitch,
9848 events,
9849 event);
9850}

9853inline cl_int enqueueReadImage(
9854 const Image& image,
9855 cl_bool blocking,
9856 const array<size_type, 3>& origin,
9857 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
9858 size_type row_pitch,
9859 size_type slice_pitch,
9860 void* ptr,
9861 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9862 Event* event = nullptr)
9863{
9864 cl_int error;
9865 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9866
9867 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9868 return error;
9869 }
9870
9871 return queue.enqueueReadImage(
9872 image,
9873 blocking,
9874 origin,
9875 region,
9876 row_pitch,
9877 slice_pitch,
9878 ptr,
9879 events,
9880 event);
9881}
9882
9883inline cl_int enqueueReadImage(
9884 const Image& image,
9885 cl_bool blocking,
9886 const array<size_type, 2>& origin,
9887 const array<size_type, 2>& region,
9888 size_type row_pitch,
9889 size_type slice_pitch,
9890 void* ptr,
9891 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9892 Event* event = nullptr)
9893{
9894 return enqueueReadImage(
9895 image,
9896 blocking,
9897 { origin[0], origin[1], 0 },
9898 { region[0], region[1], 1 },
9899 row_pitch,
9900 slice_pitch,
9901 ptr,
9902 events,
9903 event);
9904}

9906inline cl_int enqueueWriteImage(
9907 const Image& image,
9908 cl_bool blocking,
9909 const array<size_type, 3>& origin,
9910 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
9911 size_type row_pitch,
9912 size_type slice_pitch,
9913 const void* ptr,
9914 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9915 Event* event = nullptr)
9916{
9917 cl_int error;
9918 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9919
9920 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9921 return error;
9922 }
9923
9924 return queue.enqueueWriteImage(
9925 image,
9926 blocking,
9927 origin,
9928 region,
9929 row_pitch,
9930 slice_pitch,
9931 ptr,
9932 events,
9933 event);
9934}

9937 const Image& image,
9938 cl_bool blocking,
9939 const array<size_type, 2>& origin,
9940 const array<size_type, 2>& region,
9941 size_type row_pitch,
9942 size_type slice_pitch,
