9959inline cl_int enqueueCopyImage(
9960 const Image& src,
9961 const Image& dst,
9962 const array<size_type, 3>& src_origin,
9963 const array<size_type, 3>& dst_origin,
9964 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
9965 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9966 Event* event = nullptr)
9967{
9968 cl_int error;
9969 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9970
9971 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9972 return error;
9973 }
9974
9975 return queue.enqueueCopyImage(
9976 src,
9977 dst,
9978 src_origin,
9979 dst_origin,
9980 region,
9981 events,
9982 event);
9983}
9984
9985inline cl_int enqueueCopyImage(
9986 const Image& src,
9987 const Image& dst,
9988 const array<size_type, 2>& src_origin,
9989 const array<size_type, 2>& dst_origin,
9990 const array<size_type, 2>& region,
9991 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
9992 Event* event = nullptr)
9993{
9994 return enqueueCopyImage(
9995 src,
9996 dst,
9997 { src_origin[0], src_origin[1], 0 },
9998 { dst_origin[0], dst_origin[1], 0 },
9999 { region[0], region[1], 1 },
10000 events,
10001 event);
10002}
10003
10004inline cl_int enqueueCopyImageToBuffer(
10005 const Image& src,
10006 const Buffer& dst,
10007 const array<size_type, 3>& src_origin,
10008 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
10009 size_type dst_offset,
10010 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
10011 Event* event = nullptr)
10012{
10013 cl_int error;
10014 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
10015
10016 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
10017 return error;
10018 }
10019
10020 return queue.enqueueCopyImageToBuffer(
10021 src,
10022 dst,
10023 src_origin,
10024 region,
10025 dst_offset,
10026 events,
10027 event);
10028}
10029
10030inline cl_int enqueueCopyImageToBuffer(
10031 const Image& src,
10032 const Buffer& dst,
10033 const array<size_type, 2>& src_origin,
10034 const array<size_type, 2>& region,
10035 size_type dst_offset,
10036 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
10037 Event* event = nullptr)
10038{
10039 return enqueueCopyImageToBuffer(
10040 src,
10041 dst,
10042 { src_origin[0], src_origin[1], 0 },
10043 { region[0], region[1], 1 },
10044 dst_offset,
10045 events,
10046 event);
10047}
10048
10049inline cl_int enqueueCopyBufferToImage(
10050 const Buffer& src,
10051 const Image& dst,
10052 size_type src_offset,
10053 const array<size_type, 3>& dst_origin,
10054 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
10055 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
10056 Event* event = nullptr)
10057{
10058 cl_int error;
10059 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
10060
10061 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
10062 return error;
10063 }
10064
10065 return queue.enqueueCopyBufferToImage(
10066 src,
10067 dst,
10068 src_offset,
10069 dst_origin,
10070 region,
10071 events,
10072 event);
10073}
10074
10075inline cl_int enqueueCopyBufferToImage(
10076 const Buffer& src,
10077 const Image& dst,
10078 size_type src_offset,
10079 const array<size_type, 2>& dst_origin,
10080 const array<size_type, 2>& region,
10081 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
10082 Event* event = nullptr)
10083{
10084 cl_int error;
10085 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
10086
10087 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
10088 return error;
10089 }
10090
10091 return enqueueCopyBufferToImage(
10092 src,
10093 dst,
10094 src_offset,
10095 { dst_origin[0], dst_origin[1], 0 },
10096 { region[0], region[1], 1 },
10097 events,
10098 event);
10099}
10100
10101inline cl_int flush(void)
10102{
10103 cl_int error;
10104 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
10105
10106 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
10107 return error;
10108 }
10109
10110 return queue.flush();
10111}
10112
10113inline cl_int finish(void)
10114{
10115 cl_int error;
10116 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
10117
10118 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
10119 return error;
10120 }
10121
10122
10123 return queue.finish();
10124}
10125
10126class EnqueueArgs
10127{
10128private:
10129 CommandQueue queue_;
10130 const NDRange offset_;
10131 const NDRange global_;
10132 const NDRange local_;
10133 vector<Event> events_;
10134
10135 template<typename... Ts>
10136 friend class KernelFunctor;
10137
10138public:
10139 EnqueueArgs(NDRange global) :
10140 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
10141 offset_(NullRange),
10142 global_(global),
10143 local_(NullRange)
10144 {
10145
10146 }
10147
10148 EnqueueArgs(NDRange global, NDRange local) :
10149 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
10150 offset_(NullRange),
10151 global_(global),
10152 local_(local)
10153 {
10154
10155 }
10156
10157 EnqueueArgs(NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
10158 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
10159 offset_(offset),
10160 global_(global),
10161 local_(local)
10162 {
10163
10164 }
10165
10166 EnqueueArgs(Event e, NDRange global) :
10167 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
10168 offset_(NullRange),
10169 global_(global),
10170 local_(NullRange)
10171 {
10172 events_.push_back(e);
10173 }
10174
10175 EnqueueArgs(Event e, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
10176 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
10177 offset_(NullRange),
10178 global_(global),
10179 local_(local)
10180 {
10181 events_.push_back(e);
10182 }
10183
10184 EnqueueArgs(Event e, NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
10185 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
10186 offset_(offset),
10187 global_(global),
10188 local_(local)
10189 {
10190 events_.push_back(e);
10191 }
10192
10193 EnqueueArgs(const vector<Event> &events, NDRange global) :
10194 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
10195 offset_(NullRange),
10196 global_(global),
10197 local_(NullRange),
10198 events_(events)
10199 {
10200
10201 }
10202
10203 EnqueueArgs(const vector<Event> &events, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
10204 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
10205 offset_(NullRange),
10206 global_(global),
10207 local_(local),
10208 events_(events)
10209 {
10210
10211 }
10212
10213 EnqueueArgs(const vector<Event> &events, NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
10214 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
10215 offset_(offset),
10216 global_(global),
10217 local_(local),
10218 events_(events)
10219 {
10220
10221 }
10222
10223 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, NDRange global) :
10224 queue_(queue),
10225 offset_(NullRange),
10226 global_(global),
10227 local_(NullRange)
10228 {
10229
10230 }
10231
10232 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
10233 queue_(queue),
10234 offset_(NullRange),
10235 global_(global),
10236 local_(local)
10237 {
10238
10239 }
10240
10241 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
10242 queue_(queue),
10243 offset_(offset),
10244 global_(global),
10245 local_(local)
10246 {
10247
10248 }
10249
10250 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, Event e, NDRange global) :
10251 queue_(queue),
10252 offset_(NullRange),
10253 global_(global),
10254 local_(NullRange)
10255 {
10256 events_.push_back(e);
10257 }
10258
10259 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, Event e, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
10260 queue_(queue),
10261 offset_(NullRange),
10262 global_(global),
10263 local_(local)
10264 {
10265 events_.push_back(e);
10266 }
10267
10268 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, Event e, NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
10269 queue_(queue),
10270 offset_(offset),
10271 global_(global),
10272 local_(local)
10273 {
10274 events_.push_back(e);
10275 }
10276
10277 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, const vector<Event> &events, NDRange global) :
10278 queue_(queue),
10279 offset_(NullRange),
10280 global_(global),
10281 local_(NullRange),
10282 events_(events)
10283 {
10284
10285 }
10286
10287 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, const vector<Event> &events, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
10288 queue_(queue),
10289 offset_(NullRange),
10290 global_(global),
10291 local_(local),
10292 events_(events)
10293 {
10294
10295 }
10296
10297 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, const vector<Event> &events, NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
10298 queue_(queue),
10299 offset_(offset),
10300 global_(global),
10301 local_(local),
10302 events_(events)
10303 {
10304
10305 }
10306};
10307
10308
10309//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10310
10311
10316template<typename... Ts>
10317class KernelFunctor
10318{
10319private:
10320 Kernel kernel_;
10321
10322 template<int index, typename T0, typename... T1s>
10323 void setArgs(T0&& t0, T1s&&... t1s)
10324 {
10325 kernel_.setArg(index, t0);
10326 setArgs<index + 1, T1s...>(std::forward<T1s>(t1s)...);
10327 }
10328
10329 template<int index, typename T0>
10330 void setArgs(T0&& t0)
10331 {
10332 kernel_.setArg(index, t0);
10333 }
10334
10335 template<int index>
10336 void setArgs()
10337 {
10338 }
10339
10340
10341public:
10342 KernelFunctor(Kernel kernel) : kernel_(kernel)
10343 {}
10344
10345 KernelFunctor(
10346 const Program& program,
10347 const string name,
10348 cl_int * err = nullptr) :
10349 kernel_(program, name.c_str(), err)
10350 {}
10351
10353 typedef Event result_type;
10354
10360 Event operator() (
10361 const EnqueueArgs& args,
10362 Ts... ts)
10363 {
10364 Event event;
10365 setArgs<0>(std::forward<Ts>(ts)...);
10366
10367 args.queue_.enqueueNDRangeKernel(
10368 kernel_,
10369 args.offset_,
10370 args.global_,
10371 args.local_,
10372 &args.events_,
10373 &event);
10374
10375 return event;
10376 }
10377
10384 Event operator() (
10385 const EnqueueArgs& args,
10386 Ts... ts,
10387 cl_int &error)
10388 {
10389 Event event;
10390 setArgs<0>(std::forward<Ts>(ts)...);
10391
10392 error = args.queue_.enqueueNDRangeKernel(
10393 kernel_,
10394 args.offset_,
10395 args.global_,
10396 args.local_,
10397 &args.events_,
10398 &event);
10399
10400 return event;
10401 }
10402
10403#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
10404 cl_int setSVMPointers(const vector<void*> &pointerList)
10405 {
10406 return kernel_.setSVMPointers(pointerList);
10407 }
10408
10409 template<typename T0, typename... T1s>
10410 cl_int setSVMPointers(const T0 &t0, T1s &... ts)
10411 {
10412 return kernel_.setSVMPointers(t0, ts...);
10413 }
10414#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
10415
10416 Kernel getKernel()
10417 {
10418 return kernel_;
10419 }
10420};
10421
10422namespace compatibility {
10427 template<typename... Ts>
10428 struct make_kernel
10429 {
10430 typedef KernelFunctor<Ts...> FunctorType;
10431
10432 FunctorType functor_;
10433
10434 make_kernel(
10435 const Program& program,
10436 const string name,
10437 cl_int * err = nullptr) :
10438 functor_(FunctorType(program, name, err))
10439 {}
10440
10441 make_kernel(
10442 const Kernel kernel) :
10443 functor_(FunctorType(kernel))
10444 {}
10445
10447 typedef Event result_type;
10448
10450 typedef Event type_(
10451 const EnqueueArgs&,
10452 Ts...);
10453
10454 Event operator()(
10455 const EnqueueArgs& enqueueArgs,
10456 Ts... args)
10457 {
10458 return functor_(
10459 enqueueArgs, args...);
10460 }
10461 };
10462} // namespace compatibility
10463
10464#ifdef cl_khr_semaphore
10465
10466#ifdef cl_khr_external_semaphore
10467enum ExternalSemaphoreType : cl_external_semaphore_handle_type_khr
10468{
10469 None = 0,
10470#ifdef cl_khr_external_semaphore_dx_fence
10471 D3D12Fence = CL_SEMAPHORE_HANDLE_D3D12_FENCE_KHR,
10472#endif
10473#ifdef cl_khr_external_semaphore_opaque_fd
10474 OpaqueFd = CL_SEMAPHORE_HANDLE_OPAQUE_FD_KHR,
10475#endif
10476#ifdef cl_khr_external_semaphore_sync_fd
10477 SyncFd = CL_SEMAPHORE_HANDLE_SYNC_FD_KHR,
10478#endif
10479#ifdef cl_khr_external_semaphore_win32
10480 OpaqueWin32 = CL_SEMAPHORE_HANDLE_OPAQUE_WIN32_KHR,
10481 OpaqueWin32Kmt = CL_SEMAPHORE_HANDLE_OPAQUE_WIN32_KMT_KHR,
10482#endif // cl_khr_external_semaphore_win32
10483};
10484#endif // cl_khr_external_semaphore
10485
10486class Semaphore : public detail::Wrapper<cl_semaphore_khr>
10487{
10488public:
10489 Semaphore() : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>() {}
10490 Semaphore(
10491 const Context &context,
10492 const vector<cl_semaphore_properties_khr>& sema_props,
10493 cl_int *err = nullptr)
10494 {
10495 /* initialization of addresses to extension functions (it is done only once) */
10496 std::call_once(ext_init_, initExtensions, context);
10497
10498 cl_int error = CL_INVALID_OPERATION;
10499
10500 if (pfn_clCreateSemaphoreWithPropertiesKHR)
10501 {
10502 object_ = pfn_clCreateSemaphoreWithPropertiesKHR(
10503 context(),
10504 sema_props.data(),
10505 &error);
10506 }
10507
10508 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_SEMAPHORE_KHR_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
10509
10510 if (err != nullptr) {
10511 *err = error;
10512 }
10513 }
10514 Semaphore(
10515 const vector<cl_semaphore_properties_khr>& sema_props,
10516 cl_int* err = nullptr):Semaphore(Context::getDefault(err), sema_props, err) {}
10517
10518 explicit Semaphore(const cl_semaphore_khr& semaphore, bool retainObject = false) :
10519 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(semaphore, retainObject) {}
10520 Semaphore& operator = (const cl_semaphore_khr& rhs) {
10521 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
10522 return *this;
10523 }
10524 template <typename T>
10525 cl_int getInfo(cl_semaphore_info_khr name, T* param) const
10526 {
10527 if (pfn_clGetSemaphoreInfoKHR == nullptr) {
10528 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_OPERATION,
10529 __GET_SEMAPHORE_KHR_INFO_ERR);
10530 }
10531
10532 return detail::errHandler(
10533 detail::getInfo(pfn_clGetSemaphoreInfoKHR, object_, name, param),
10534 __GET_SEMAPHORE_KHR_INFO_ERR);
10535 }
10536 template <cl_semaphore_info_khr name> typename
10537 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_semaphore_info_khr, name>::param_type
10538 getInfo(cl_int* err = nullptr) const
10539 {
10540 typename detail::param_traits<
10541 detail::cl_semaphore_info_khr, name>::param_type param;
10542 cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
10543 if (err != nullptr) {
10544 *err = result;
10545 }
10546 return param;
10547 }
10548
10549#ifdef cl_khr_external_semaphore
10550 template <typename T>
10551 cl_int getHandleForTypeKHR(
10552 const Device& device, cl_external_semaphore_handle_type_khr name, T* param) const
10553 {
10554 if (pfn_clGetSemaphoreHandleForTypeKHR == nullptr) {
10555 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_OPERATION,
10556 __GET_SEMAPHORE_HANDLE_FOR_TYPE_KHR_ERR);
10557 }
10558
10559 return detail::errHandler(
10560 detail::getInfo(
10561 pfn_clGetSemaphoreHandleForTypeKHR, object_, device(), name, param),
10562 __GET_SEMAPHORE_HANDLE_FOR_TYPE_KHR_ERR);
10563 }
10564
10565 template <cl_external_semaphore_handle_type_khr type> typename
10566 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_external_semaphore_handle_type_khr, type>::param_type
10567 getHandleForTypeKHR(const Device& device, cl_int* err = nullptr) const
10568 {
10569 typename detail::param_traits<
10570 detail::cl_external_semaphore_handle_type_khr, type>::param_type param;
10571 cl_int result = getHandleForTypeKHR(device, type, &param);
10572 if (err != nullptr) {
10573 *err = result;
10574 }
10575 return param;
10576 }
10577#endif // cl_khr_external_semaphore
10578
10579 cl_int retain()
10580 {
10581 if (pfn_clRetainSemaphoreKHR == nullptr) {
10582 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_OPERATION,
10583 __RETAIN_SEMAPHORE_KHR_ERR);
10584 }
10585 return pfn_clRetainSemaphoreKHR(object_);
10586 }
10587
10588 cl_int release()
10589 {
10590 if (pfn_clReleaseSemaphoreKHR == nullptr) {
10591 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_OPERATION,
10592 __RELEASE_SEMAPHORE_KHR_ERR);
10593 }
10594 return pfn_clReleaseSemaphoreKHR(object_);
10595 }
10596
10597private:
10598 static std::once_flag ext_init_;
10599
10600 static void initExtensions(const Context& context)
10601 {
10602#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
10603 Device device = context.getInfo<CL_CONTEXT_DEVICES>().at(0);
10604 cl_platform_id platform = device.getInfo<CL_DEVICE_PLATFORM>()();
10605 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clCreateSemaphoreWithPropertiesKHR);
10606 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clReleaseSemaphoreKHR);
10607 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clRetainSemaphoreKHR);
10608 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clEnqueueWaitSemaphoresKHR);
10609 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clEnqueueSignalSemaphoresKHR);
10610 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clGetSemaphoreInfoKHR);
10611#ifdef cl_khr_external_semaphore
10612 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clGetSemaphoreHandleForTypeKHR);
10613#endif // cl_khr_external_semaphore
10614
10615#else
10616 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clCreateSemaphoreWithPropertiesKHR);
10617 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clReleaseSemaphoreKHR);
10618 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clRetainSemaphoreKHR);
10619 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clEnqueueWaitSemaphoresKHR);
10620 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clEnqueueSignalSemaphoresKHR);
10621 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clGetSemaphoreInfoKHR);
10622#ifdef cl_khr_external_semaphore
10623 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clGetSemaphoreHandleForTypeKHR);
10624#endif // cl_khr_external_semaphore
10625
10626#endif
10627 if ((pfn_clCreateSemaphoreWithPropertiesKHR == nullptr) &&
10628 (pfn_clReleaseSemaphoreKHR == nullptr) &&
10629 (pfn_clRetainSemaphoreKHR == nullptr) &&
10630 (pfn_clEnqueueWaitSemaphoresKHR == nullptr) &&
10631 (pfn_clEnqueueSignalSemaphoresKHR == nullptr) &&
10632#ifdef cl_khr_external_semaphore
10633 (pfn_clGetSemaphoreHandleForTypeKHR == nullptr) &&
10634#endif // cl_khr_external_semaphore
10635 (pfn_clGetSemaphoreInfoKHR == nullptr))
10636 {
10637 detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_VALUE, __CREATE_SEMAPHORE_KHR_WITH_PROPERTIES_ERR);
10638 }
10639 }
10640
10641};
10642
10643CL_HPP_DEFINE_STATIC_MEMBER_ std::once_flag Semaphore::ext_init_;
10644
10645inline cl_int CommandQueue::enqueueWaitSemaphores(
10646 const vector<Semaphore> &sema_objects,
10647 const vector<cl_semaphore_payload_khr> &sema_payloads,
10648 const vector<Event>* events_wait_list,
10649 Event *event) const
10650{
10651 cl_event tmp;
10652 cl_int err = CL_INVALID_OPERATION;
10653
10654 if (pfn_clEnqueueWaitSemaphoresKHR != nullptr) {
10655 err = pfn_clEnqueueWaitSemaphoresKHR(
10656 object_,
10657 (cl_uint)sema_objects.size(),
10658 (const cl_semaphore_khr *) &sema_objects.front(),
10659 (sema_payloads.size() > 0) ? &sema_payloads.front() : nullptr,
10660 (events_wait_list != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events_wait_list->size() : 0,
10661 (events_wait_list != nullptr && events_wait_list->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events_wait_list->front() : nullptr,
10662 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr);
10663 }
10664
10665 detail::errHandler(err, __ENQUEUE_WAIT_SEMAPHORE_KHR_ERR);
10666
10667 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
10668 *event = tmp;
10669
10670 return err;
10671}
10672
10673inline cl_int CommandQueue::enqueueSignalSemaphores(
10674 const vector<Semaphore> &sema_objects,
10675 const vector<cl_semaphore_payload_khr>& sema_payloads,
10676 const vector<Event>* events_wait_list,
10677 Event* event)
10678{
10679 cl_event tmp;
10680 cl_int err = CL_INVALID_OPERATION;
10681
10682 if (pfn_clEnqueueSignalSemaphoresKHR != nullptr) {
10683 err = pfn_clEnqueueSignalSemaphoresKHR(
10684 object_,
10685 (cl_uint)sema_objects.size(),
10686 (const cl_semaphore_khr*) &sema_objects.front(),
10687 (sema_payloads.size() > 0) ? &sema_payloads.front() : nullptr,
10688 (events_wait_list != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events_wait_list->size() : 0,
10689 (events_wait_list != nullptr && events_wait_list->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events_wait_list->front() : nullptr,
10690 (event != nullptr) ? &tmp : nullptr);
10691 }
10692
10693 detail::errHandler(err, __ENQUEUE_SIGNAL_SEMAPHORE_KHR_ERR);
10694
10695 if (event != nullptr && err == CL_SUCCESS)
10696 *event = tmp;
10697
10698 return err;
10699}
10700
10701#endif // cl_khr_semaphore
10702
10703#if defined(cl_khr_command_buffer)
10707class CommandBufferKhr : public detail::Wrapper<cl_command_buffer_khr>
10708{
10709public:
10711 CommandBufferKhr() : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>() { }
10712
10713 explicit CommandBufferKhr(const vector<CommandQueue> &queues,
10714 cl_command_buffer_properties_khr properties = 0,
10715 cl_int* errcode_ret = nullptr)
10716 {
10717 cl_command_buffer_properties_khr command_buffer_properties[] = {
10718 CL_COMMAND_BUFFER_FLAGS_KHR, properties, 0
10719 };
10720
10721 /* initialization of addresses to extension functions (it is done only once) */
10722 std::call_once(ext_init_, [&] { initExtensions(queues[0].getInfo<CL_QUEUE_DEVICE>()); });
10723 cl_int error = CL_INVALID_OPERATION;
10724
10725 static_assert(sizeof(cl::CommandQueue) == sizeof(cl_command_queue),
10726 "Size of cl::CommandQueue must be equal to size of cl_command_queue");
10727
10728 if (pfn_clCreateCommandBufferKHR)
10729 {
10730 object_ = pfn_clCreateCommandBufferKHR((cl_uint) queues.size(),
10731 (cl_command_queue *) &queues.front(),
10732 command_buffer_properties,
10733 &error);
10734 }
10735
10736 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_BUFFER_KHR_ERR);
10737 if (errcode_ret != nullptr) {
10738 *errcode_ret = error;
10739 }
10740 }
10741
10742 explicit CommandBufferKhr(const cl_command_buffer_khr& commandBufferKhr, bool retainObject = false) :
10743 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(commandBufferKhr, retainObject) { }
10744
10745 CommandBufferKhr& operator=(const cl_command_buffer_khr& rhs)
10746 {
10747 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
10748 return *this;
10749 }
10750
10751 template <typename T>
10752 cl_int getInfo(cl_command_buffer_info_khr name, T* param) const
10753 {
10754 if (pfn_clGetCommandBufferInfoKHR == nullptr) {
10755 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_OPERATION,
10756 __GET_COMMAND_BUFFER_INFO_KHR_ERR);
10757 }
10758 return detail::errHandler(
10759 detail::getInfo(pfn_clGetCommandBufferInfoKHR, object_, name, param),
10760 __GET_COMMAND_BUFFER_INFO_KHR_ERR);
10761 }
10762
10763 template <cl_command_buffer_info_khr name> typename
10764 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_command_buffer_info_khr, name>::param_type
10765 getInfo(cl_int* err = nullptr) const
10766 {
10767 typename detail::param_traits<
10768 detail::cl_command_buffer_info_khr, name>::param_type param;
10769 cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
10770 if (err != nullptr) {
10771 *err = result;
10772 }
10773 return param;
10774 }
10775
10776 cl_int finalizeCommandBuffer() const
10777 {
10778 return detail::errHandler(::clFinalizeCommandBufferKHR(object_), __FINALIZE_COMMAND_BUFFER_KHR_ERR);
10779 }
10780
10781 cl_int enqueueCommandBuffer(vector<CommandQueue> &queues,
10782 const vector<Event>* events = nullptr,
10783 Event* event = nullptr)
10784 {
10785 if (pfn_clEnqueueCommandBufferKHR == nullptr) {
10786 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_OPERATION,
10787 __ENQUEUE_COMMAND_BUFFER_KHR_ERR);
10788 }
10789
10790 static_assert(sizeof(cl::CommandQueue) == sizeof(cl_command_queue),
10791 "Size of cl::CommandQueue must be equal to size of cl_command_queue");
10792
10793 return detail::errHandler(pfn_clEnqueueCommandBufferKHR((cl_uint) queues.size(),
10794 (cl_command_queue *) &queues.front(),
10795 object_,
10796 (events != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
10797 (events != nullptr && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : nullptr,
10798 (cl_event*) event),
10799 __ENQUEUE_COMMAND_BUFFER_KHR_ERR);
10800 }
10801
10802 cl_int commandBarrierWithWaitList(const vector<cl_sync_point_khr>* sync_points_vec = nullptr,
10803 cl_sync_point_khr* sync_point = nullptr,
10804 MutableCommandKhr* mutable_handle = nullptr,
10805 const CommandQueue* command_queue = nullptr)
10806 {
10807 if (pfn_clCommandBarrierWithWaitListKHR == nullptr) {
10808 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_OPERATION,
10809 __COMMAND_BARRIER_WITH_WAIT_LIST_KHR_ERR);
10810 }
10811
10812 cl_sync_point_khr tmp_sync_point;
10813 cl_int error = detail::errHandler(
10814 pfn_clCommandBarrierWithWaitListKHR(object_,
10815 (command_queue != nullptr) ? (*command_queue)() : nullptr,
10816 (sync_points_vec != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) sync_points_vec->size() : 0,
10817 (sync_points_vec != nullptr && sync_points_vec->size() > 0) ? &sync_points_vec->front() : nullptr,
10818 (sync_point != nullptr) ? &tmp_sync_point : nullptr,
10819 (cl_mutable_command_khr*) mutable_handle),
10820 __COMMAND_BARRIER_WITH_WAIT_LIST_KHR_ERR);
10821
10822 if (sync_point != nullptr && error == CL_SUCCESS)
10823 *sync_point = tmp_sync_point;
10824
10825 return error;
10826 }
10827
10828 cl_int commandCopyBuffer(const Buffer& src,
10829 const Buffer& dst,
10830 size_type src_offset,
10831 size_type dst_offset,
10832 size_type size,
10833 const vector<cl_sync_point_khr>* sync_points_vec = nullptr,
10834 cl_sync_point_khr* sync_point = nullptr,
10835 MutableCommandKhr* mutable_handle = nullptr,
10836 const CommandQueue* command_queue = nullptr)
10837 {
10838 if (pfn_clCommandCopyBufferKHR == nullptr) {
10839 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_OPERATION,
10840 __COMMAND_COPY_BUFFER_KHR_ERR);
10841 }
10842
10843 cl_sync_point_khr tmp_sync_point;
10844 cl_int error = detail::errHandler(
10845 pfn_clCommandCopyBufferKHR(object_,
10846 (command_queue != nullptr) ? (*command_queue)() : nullptr,
10847 src(),
10848 dst(),
10849 src_offset,
10850 dst_offset,
10851 size,
10852 (sync_points_vec != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) sync_points_vec->size() : 0,
10853 (sync_points_vec != nullptr && sync_points_vec->size() > 0) ? &sync_points_vec->front() : nullptr,
10854 (sync_point != nullptr) ? &tmp_sync_point : nullptr,
10855 (cl_mutable_command_khr*) mutable_handle),
10856 __COMMAND_COPY_BUFFER_KHR_ERR);
10857
10858 if (sync_point != nullptr && error == CL_SUCCESS)
10859 *sync_point = tmp_sync_point;
10860
10861 return error;
10862 }
10863
10864 cl_int commandCopyBufferRect(const Buffer& src,
10865 const Buffer& dst,
10866 const array<size_type, 3>& src_origin,
10867 const array<size_type, 3>& dst_origin,
10868 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
10869 size_type src_row_pitch,
10870 size_type src_slice_pitch,
10871 size_type dst_row_pitch,
10872 size_type dst_slice_pitch,
10873 const vector<cl_sync_point_khr>* sync_points_vec = nullptr,
10874 cl_sync_point_khr* sync_point = nullptr,
10875 MutableCommandKhr* mutable_handle = nullptr,
10876 const CommandQueue* command_queue = nullptr)
10877 {
10878 if (pfn_clCommandCopyBufferRectKHR == nullptr) {
10879 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_OPERATION,
10880 __COMMAND_COPY_BUFFER_RECT_KHR_ERR);
10881 }
10882
10883 cl_sync_point_khr tmp_sync_point;
10884 cl_int error = detail::errHandler(
10885 pfn_clCommandCopyBufferRectKHR(object_,
10886 (command_queue != nullptr) ? (*command_queue)() : nullptr,
10887 src(),
10888 dst(),
10889 src_origin.data(),
10890 dst_origin.data(),
10891 region.data(),
10892 src_row_pitch,
10893 src_slice_pitch,
10894 dst_row_pitch,
10895 dst_slice_pitch,
10896 (sync_points_vec != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) sync_points_vec->size() : 0,
10897 (sync_points_vec != nullptr && sync_points_vec->size() > 0) ? &sync_points_vec->front() : nullptr,
10898 (sync_point != nullptr) ? &tmp_sync_point : nullptr,
10899 (cl_mutable_command_khr*) mutable_handle),
10900 __COMMAND_COPY_BUFFER_RECT_KHR_ERR);
10901
10902 if (sync_point != nullptr && error == CL_SUCCESS)
10903 *sync_point = tmp_sync_point;
10904
10905 return error;
10906 }
10907
10908 cl_int commandCopyBufferToImage(const Buffer& src,
10909 const Image& dst,
10910 size_type src_offset,
10911 const array<size_type, 3>& dst_origin,
10912 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
10913 const vector<cl_sync_point_khr>* sync_points_vec = nullptr,
10914 cl_sync_point_khr* sync_point = nullptr,
10915 MutableCommandKhr* mutable_handle = nullptr,
10916 const CommandQueue* command_queue = nullptr)
10917 {
10918 if (pfn_clCommandCopyBufferToImageKHR == nullptr) {
10919 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_OPERATION,
10920 __COMMAND_COPY_BUFFER_TO_IMAGE_KHR_ERR);
10921 }
10922
10923 cl_sync_point_khr tmp_sync_point;
10924 cl_int error = detail::errHandler(
10925 pfn_clCommandCopyBufferToImageKHR(object_,
10926 (command_queue != nullptr) ? (*command_queue)() : nullptr,
10927 src(),
10928 dst(),
10929 src_offset,
10930 dst_origin.data(),
10931 region.data(),
10932 (sync_points_vec != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) sync_points_vec->size() : 0,
10933 (sync_points_vec != nullptr && sync_points_vec->size() > 0) ? &sync_points_vec->front() : nullptr,
10934 (sync_point != nullptr) ? &tmp_sync_point : nullptr,
10935 (cl_mutable_command_khr*) mutable_handle),
10936 __COMMAND_COPY_BUFFER_TO_IMAGE_KHR_ERR);
10937
10938 if (sync_point != nullptr && error == CL_SUCCESS)
10939 *sync_point = tmp_sync_point;
10940
10941 return error;
10942 }
10943
10944 cl_int commandCopyImage(const Image& src,
10945 const Image& dst,
10946 const array<size_type, 3>& src_origin,
10947 const array<size_type, 3>& dst_origin,
10948 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
10949 const vector<cl_sync_point_khr>* sync_points_vec = nullptr,
10950 cl_sync_point_khr* sync_point = nullptr,
10951 MutableCommandKhr* mutable_handle = nullptr,
10952 const CommandQueue* command_queue = nullptr)
10953 {
10954 if (pfn_clCommandCopyImageKHR == nullptr) {
10955 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_OPERATION,
10956 __COMMAND_COPY_IMAGE_KHR_ERR);
10957 }
10958
10959 cl_sync_point_khr tmp_sync_point;
10960 cl_int error = detail::errHandler(
10961 pfn_clCommandCopyImageKHR(object_,
10962 (command_queue != nullptr) ? (*command_queue)() : nullptr,
10963 src(),
10964 dst(),
10965 src_origin.data(),
10966 dst_origin.data(),
10967 region.data(),
10968 (sync_points_vec != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) sync_points_vec->size() : 0,
10969 (sync_points_vec != nullptr && sync_points_vec->size() > 0) ? &sync_points_vec->front() : nullptr,
10970 (sync_point != nullptr) ? &tmp_sync_point : nullptr,
10971 (cl_mutable_command_khr*) mutable_handle),
10972 __COMMAND_COPY_IMAGE_KHR_ERR);
10973
10974 if (sync_point != nullptr && error == CL_SUCCESS)
10975 *sync_point = tmp_sync_point;
10976
10977 return error;
10978 }
10979
10980 cl_int commandCopyImageToBuffer(const Image& src,
10981 const Buffer& dst,
10982 const array<size_type, 3>& src_origin,
10983 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
10984 size_type dst_offset,
10985 const vector<cl_sync_point_khr>* sync_points_vec = nullptr,
10986 cl_sync_point_khr* sync_point = nullptr,
10987 MutableCommandKhr* mutable_handle = nullptr,
10988 const CommandQueue* command_queue = nullptr)
10989 {
10990 if (pfn_clCommandCopyImageToBufferKHR == nullptr) {
10991 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_OPERATION,
10992 __COMMAND_COPY_IMAGE_TO_BUFFER_KHR_ERR);
10993 }
10994
10995 cl_sync_point_khr tmp_sync_point;
10996 cl_int error = detail::errHandler(
10997 pfn_clCommandCopyImageToBufferKHR(object_,
10998 (command_queue != nullptr) ? (*command_queue)() : nullptr,
10999 src(),
11000 dst(),
11001 src_origin.data(),
11002 region.data(),
11003 dst_offset,
11004 (sync_points_vec != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) sync_points_vec->size() : 0,
11005 (sync_points_vec != nullptr && sync_points_vec->size() > 0) ? &sync_points_vec->front() : nullptr,
11006 (sync_point != nullptr) ? &tmp_sync_point : nullptr,
11007 (cl_mutable_command_khr*) mutable_handle),
11008 __COMMAND_COPY_IMAGE_TO_BUFFER_KHR_ERR);
11009
11010 if (sync_point != nullptr && error == CL_SUCCESS)
11011 *sync_point = tmp_sync_point;
11012
11013 return error;
11014 }
11015
11016 template<typename PatternType>
11017 cl_int commandFillBuffer(const Buffer& buffer,
11018 PatternType pattern,
11019 size_type offset,
11020 size_type size,
11021 const vector<cl_sync_point_khr>* sync_points_vec = nullptr,
11022 cl_sync_point_khr* sync_point = nullptr,
11023 MutableCommandKhr* mutable_handle = nullptr,
11024 const CommandQueue* command_queue = nullptr)
11025 {
11026 if (pfn_clCommandFillBufferKHR == nullptr) {
11027 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_OPERATION,
11028 __COMMAND_FILL_BUFFER_KHR_ERR);
11029 }
11030
11031 cl_sync_point_khr tmp_sync_point;
11032 cl_int error = detail::errHandler(
11033 pfn_clCommandFillBufferKHR(object_,
11034 (command_queue != nullptr) ? (*command_queue)() : nullptr,
11035 buffer(),
11036 static_cast<void*>(&pattern),
11037 sizeof(PatternType),
11038 offset,
11039 size,
11040 (sync_points_vec != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) sync_points_vec->size() : 0,
11041 (sync_points_vec != nullptr && sync_points_vec->size() > 0) ? &sync_points_vec->front() : nullptr,
11042 (sync_point != nullptr) ? &tmp_sync_point : nullptr,
11043 (cl_mutable_command_khr*) mutable_handle),
11044 __COMMAND_FILL_BUFFER_KHR_ERR);
11045
11046 if (sync_point != nullptr && error == CL_SUCCESS)
11047 *sync_point = tmp_sync_point;
11048
11049 return error;
11050 }
11051
11052 cl_int commandFillImage(const Image& image,
11053 cl_float4 fillColor,
11054 const array<size_type, 3>& origin,
11055 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
11056 const vector<cl_sync_point_khr>* sync_points_vec = nullptr,
11057 cl_sync_point_khr* sync_point = nullptr,
11058 MutableCommandKhr* mutable_handle = nullptr,
11059 const CommandQueue* command_queue = nullptr)
11060 {
11061 if (pfn_clCommandFillImageKHR == nullptr) {
11062 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_OPERATION,
11063 __COMMAND_FILL_IMAGE_KHR_ERR);
11064 }
11065
11066 cl_sync_point_khr tmp_sync_point;
11067 cl_int error = detail::errHandler(
11068 pfn_clCommandFillImageKHR(object_,
11069 (command_queue != nullptr) ? (*command_queue)() : nullptr,
11070 image(),
11071 static_cast<void*>(&fillColor),
11072 origin.data(),
11073 region.data(),
11074 (sync_points_vec != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) sync_points_vec->size() : 0,
11075 (sync_points_vec != nullptr && sync_points_vec->size() > 0) ? &sync_points_vec->front() : nullptr,
11076 (sync_point != nullptr) ? &tmp_sync_point : nullptr,
11077 (cl_mutable_command_khr*) mutable_handle),
11078 __COMMAND_FILL_IMAGE_KHR_ERR);
11079
11080 if (sync_point != nullptr && error == CL_SUCCESS)
11081 *sync_point = tmp_sync_point;
11082
11083 return error;
11084 }
11085
11086 cl_int commandNDRangeKernel(const cl::vector<cl_ndrange_kernel_command_properties_khr> &properties,
11087 const Kernel& kernel,
11088 const NDRange& offset,
11089 const NDRange& global,
11090 const NDRange& local = NullRange,
11091 const vector<cl_sync_point_khr>* sync_points_vec = nullptr,
11092 cl_sync_point_khr* sync_point = nullptr,
11093 MutableCommandKhr* mutable_handle = nullptr,
11094 const CommandQueue* command_queue = nullptr)
11095 {
11096 if (pfn_clCommandNDRangeKernelKHR == nullptr) {
11097 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_OPERATION,
11098 __COMMAND_NDRANGE_KERNEL_KHR_ERR);
11099 }
11100
11101 cl_sync_point_khr tmp_sync_point;
11102 cl_int error = detail::errHandler(
11103 pfn_clCommandNDRangeKernelKHR(object_,
11104 (command_queue != nullptr) ? (*command_queue)() : nullptr,
11105 &properties[0],
11106 kernel(),
11107 (cl_uint) global.dimensions(),
11108 offset.dimensions() != 0 ? (const size_type*) offset : nullptr,
11109 (const size_type*) global,
11110 local.dimensions() != 0 ? (const size_type*) local : nullptr,
11111 (sync_points_vec != nullptr) ? (cl_uint) sync_points_vec->size() : 0,
11112 (sync_points_vec != nullptr && sync_points_vec->size() > 0) ? &sync_points_vec->front() : nullptr,
11113 (sync_point != nullptr) ? &tmp_sync_point : nullptr,
11114 (cl_mutable_command_khr*) mutable_handle),
11115 __COMMAND_NDRANGE_KERNEL_KHR_ERR);
11116
11117 if (sync_point != nullptr && error == CL_SUCCESS)
11118 *sync_point = tmp_sync_point;
11119
11120 return error;
11121 }
11122
11123#if defined(cl_khr_command_buffer_mutable_dispatch)
11124 cl_int updateMutableCommands(const cl_mutable_base_config_khr* mutable_config)
11125 {
11126 if (pfn_clUpdateMutableCommandsKHR == nullptr) {
11127 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_OPERATION,
11128 __UPDATE_MUTABLE_COMMANDS_KHR_ERR);
11129 }
11130 return detail::errHandler(pfn_clUpdateMutableCommandsKHR(object_, mutable_config),
11131 __UPDATE_MUTABLE_COMMANDS_KHR_ERR);
11132 }
11133#endif /* cl_khr_command_buffer_mutable_dispatch */
11134
11135private:
11136 static std::once_flag ext_init_;
11137
11138 static void initExtensions(const cl::Device& device)
11139 {
11140#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 120
11141 cl_platform_id platform = device.getInfo<CL_DEVICE_PLATFORM>()();
11142 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clCreateCommandBufferKHR);
11143 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clFinalizeCommandBufferKHR);
11144 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clRetainCommandBufferKHR);
11145 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clReleaseCommandBufferKHR);
11146 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clGetCommandBufferInfoKHR);
11147 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clEnqueueCommandBufferKHR);
11148 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clCommandBarrierWithWaitListKHR);
11149 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clCommandCopyBufferKHR);
11150 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clCommandCopyBufferRectKHR);
11151 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clCommandCopyBufferToImageKHR);
11152 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clCommandCopyImageKHR);
11153 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clCommandCopyImageToBufferKHR);
11154 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clCommandFillBufferKHR);
11155 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clCommandFillImageKHR);
11156 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clCommandNDRangeKernelKHR);
11157#if defined(cl_khr_command_buffer_mutable_dispatch)
11158 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clUpdateMutableCommandsKHR);
11159 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM_(platform, clGetMutableCommandInfoKHR);
11160#endif /* cl_khr_command_buffer_mutable_dispatch */
11161#elif CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 110
11162 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clCreateCommandBufferKHR);
11163 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clFinalizeCommandBufferKHR);
11164 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clRetainCommandBufferKHR);
11165 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clReleaseCommandBufferKHR);
11166 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clGetCommandBufferInfoKHR);
11167 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clEnqueueCommandBufferKHR);
11168 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clCommandBarrierWithWaitListKHR);
11169 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clCommandCopyBufferKHR);
11170 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clCommandCopyBufferRectKHR);
11171 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clCommandCopyBufferToImageKHR);
11172 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clCommandCopyImageKHR);
11173 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clCommandCopyImageToBufferKHR);
11174 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clCommandFillBufferKHR);
11175 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clCommandFillImageKHR);
11176 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clCommandNDRangeKernelKHR);
11177#if defined(cl_khr_command_buffer_mutable_dispatch)
11178 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clUpdateMutableCommandsKHR);
11179 CL_HPP_INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_(clGetMutableCommandInfoKHR);
11180#endif /* cl_khr_command_buffer_mutable_dispatch */
11181#endif
11182 if ((pfn_clCreateCommandBufferKHR == nullptr) &&
11183 (pfn_clFinalizeCommandBufferKHR == nullptr) &&
11184 (pfn_clRetainCommandBufferKHR == nullptr) &&
11185 (pfn_clReleaseCommandBufferKHR == nullptr) &&
11186 (pfn_clGetCommandBufferInfoKHR == nullptr) &&
11187 (pfn_clEnqueueCommandBufferKHR == nullptr) &&
11188 (pfn_clCommandBarrierWithWaitListKHR == nullptr) &&
11189 (pfn_clCommandCopyBufferKHR == nullptr) &&
11190 (pfn_clCommandCopyBufferRectKHR == nullptr) &&
11191 (pfn_clCommandCopyBufferToImageKHR == nullptr) &&
11192 (pfn_clCommandCopyImageKHR == nullptr) &&
11193 (pfn_clCommandCopyImageToBufferKHR == nullptr) &&
11194 (pfn_clCommandFillBufferKHR == nullptr) &&
11195 (pfn_clCommandFillImageKHR == nullptr) &&
11196 (pfn_clCommandNDRangeKernelKHR == nullptr)
11197#if defined(cl_khr_command_buffer_mutable_dispatch)
11198 && (pfn_clUpdateMutableCommandsKHR == nullptr)
11199 && (pfn_clGetMutableCommandInfoKHR == nullptr)
11200#endif /* cl_khr_command_buffer_mutable_dispatch */
11201 )
11202 {
11203 detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_VALUE, __CREATE_COMMAND_BUFFER_KHR_ERR);
11204 }
11205 }
11206}; // CommandBufferKhr
11207
11208CL_HPP_DEFINE_STATIC_MEMBER_ std::once_flag CommandBufferKhr::ext_init_;
11209
11210#if defined(cl_khr_command_buffer_mutable_dispatch)
11214class MutableCommandKhr : public detail::Wrapper<cl_mutable_command_khr>
11215{
11216public:
11218 MutableCommandKhr() : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>() { }
11219
11220 explicit MutableCommandKhr(const cl_mutable_command_khr& mutableCommandKhr, bool retainObject = false) :
11221 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(mutableCommandKhr, retainObject) { }
11222
11223 MutableCommandKhr& operator=(const cl_mutable_command_khr& rhs)
11224 {
11225 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
11226 return *this;
11227 }
11228
11229 template <typename T>
11230 cl_int getInfo(cl_mutable_command_info_khr name, T* param) const
11231 {
11232 if (pfn_clGetMutableCommandInfoKHR == nullptr) {
11233 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_OPERATION,
11234 __GET_MUTABLE_COMMAND_INFO_KHR_ERR);
11235 }
11236 return detail::errHandler(
11237 detail::getInfo(pfn_clGetMutableCommandInfoKHR, object_, name, param),
11238 __GET_MUTABLE_COMMAND_INFO_KHR_ERR);
11239 }
11240
11241 template <cl_mutable_command_info_khr name> typename
11242 detail::param_traits<detail::cl_mutable_command_info_khr, name>::param_type
11243 getInfo(cl_int* err = nullptr) const
11244 {
11245 typename detail::param_traits<
11246 detail::cl_mutable_command_info_khr, name>::param_type param;
11247 cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
11248 if (err != nullptr) {
11249 *err = result;
11250 }
11251 return param;
11252 }
11253}; // MutableCommandKhr
11254#endif /* cl_khr_command_buffer_mutable_dispatch */
11255
11256#endif // cl_khr_command_buffer
11257//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

11261#undef __GET_DEVICE_INFO_ERR

11263#undef __GET_DEVICE_IDS_ERR
11264#undef __GET_PLATFORM_IDS_ERR
11265#undef __GET_CONTEXT_INFO_ERR
11266#undef __GET_EVENT_INFO_ERR
11267#undef __GET_EVENT_PROFILE_INFO_ERR
11268#undef __GET_MEM_OBJECT_INFO_ERR
11269#undef __GET_IMAGE_INFO_ERR
11270#undef __GET_SAMPLER_INFO_ERR
11271#undef __GET_KERNEL_INFO_ERR
11272#undef __GET_KERNEL_ARG_INFO_ERR
11273#undef __GET_KERNEL_SUB_GROUP_INFO_ERR
11274#undef __GET_KERNEL_WORK_GROUP_INFO_ERR
11275#undef __GET_PROGRAM_INFO_ERR
11276#undef __GET_PROGRAM_BUILD_INFO_ERR
11277#undef __GET_COMMAND_QUEUE_INFO_ERR
11278#undef __CREATE_CONTEXT_ERR
11279#undef __CREATE_CONTEXT_FROM_TYPE_ERR
11280#undef __CREATE_COMMAND_BUFFER_KHR_ERR
11281#undef __GET_COMMAND_BUFFER_INFO_KHR_ERR
11282#undef __FINALIZE_COMMAND_BUFFER_KHR_ERR
11283#undef __ENQUEUE_COMMAND_BUFFER_KHR_ERR
11284#undef __COMMAND_BARRIER_WITH_WAIT_LIST_KHR_ERR
11285#undef __COMMAND_COPY_BUFFER_KHR_ERR
11286#undef __COMMAND_COPY_BUFFER_RECT_KHR_ERR
11287#undef __COMMAND_COPY_BUFFER_TO_IMAGE_KHR_ERR
11288#undef __COMMAND_COPY_IMAGE_KHR_ERR
11289#undef __COMMAND_COPY_IMAGE_TO_BUFFER_KHR_ERR
11290#undef __COMMAND_FILL_BUFFER_KHR_ERR
11291#undef __COMMAND_FILL_IMAGE_KHR_ERR
11292#undef __COMMAND_NDRANGE_KERNEL_KHR_ERR
11293#undef __UPDATE_MUTABLE_COMMANDS_KHR_ERR
11294#undef __GET_MUTABLE_COMMAND_INFO_KHR_ERR
11295#undef __RETAIN_COMMAND_BUFFER_KHR_ERR
11296#undef __RELEASE_COMMAND_BUFFER_KHR_ERR
11297#undef __GET_SUPPORTED_IMAGE_FORMATS_ERR
11298#undef __SET_CONTEXT_DESCTRUCTOR_CALLBACK_ERR
11299#undef __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR
11300#undef __COPY_ERR
11301#undef __CREATE_SUBBUFFER_ERR
11302#undef __CREATE_GL_BUFFER_ERR
11303#undef __CREATE_GL_RENDER_BUFFER_ERR
